item.text: @#/ /mdo tsha pa bzhugs so//
@##//rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya rat+na me g+ha na ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/
'phags pa dkon mchog sprin ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dang po/
sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang 'phags pa nyan thos dang
rang sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus
gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yul g.yan ga ya mgo'i ri la dge slong bdun khri nyis stong
gi dge 'dun chen po dag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/ nyon
mongs pa med pa/ dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/ sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin tu rnam par
grol ba| cang shes pa/ glang po chen po/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes
su thob pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ bka' yang dag pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/
sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa/ chos kyi dbyings la mkhas pa/ chos kyi rgyal po'i sras/
sems rnyed pa dang / bkur sti thams cad dang bral ba/ legs par rab tu byung ba/ legs par bsnyen par rdzogs pa/
brnag pa yongs su rdzogs pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam la gnas pa sha stag ste/ gang zag gcig ma gtogs
pa ni| 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri bzhi stong gi byang chub sems dpa'i
tshogs chen po dang yang thabs cig ste/ thams cad kyang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon
du phyogs pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la 'bab pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la
bab pa/ chags pa med pa'i gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la shin
tu gnas pa/ mngon par shes pa chen pos rnam par rol pa/ lam gyi rgyun ma btsad pa/ sgrib pa dang / chod pa dang / kun nas
ldang ba thams cad dang bral ba/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen pos phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khyab
par byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas par 'gro ba la mkhas pa/ stong pa nyid spyod yul ba/ mtshan ma med pa la
gnas pa/ smon lam la gnas pa thams cad dang bral ba/ sems can thams cad la phan par brtson pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yul
thams cad la mkhas pa/ ye shes mtha' yas pa/ sems nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa/ sems rgya mtsho ltar zab pa/ sems
ri'i rgyal po ri rab ltar mi sgul ba/ sems pad+mo ltar ma gos pa/ sems rin po che ltar shin tu yongs su dag pa/ sems gser ltar shin tu yongs su byang ba rnams
la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che dpal dang / lag na rdo rje rin po che dang / lag na phyag rgya rin po che dang / rin po che'i cod pan dang /
gtsug na rin po che dang / rin po che brtsegs pa dang / rin po che 'byung gnas dang / rin po che'i rtse mo dang / rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang / rdo rje'i snying po dang / gser gyi
snying po dang / rin po che'i snying po dang / dpal gyi snying po dang / dge ba'i snying po dang / dge ba dri ma med pa'i snying po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dang / ye shes
kyi snying po dang / nyi ma'i snying po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi snying po dang / pad+ma'i snying po dang / rnam par grol ba'i zla ba dang / kun tu zla ba dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang po dang /
mthu chen thob dang / kun tu bzang po dang / kun nas mig dang / pad+ma'i mig dang / dri ma med pa'i mig dang / yangs pa'i mig dang / kun tu spyod lam dang / kun tu mdzes
dang / kun tu spyod pa'i blo gros dang / ye shes kyi blo gros dang / chos kyi blo gros dang / rgyal ba'i blo gros dang / bla ma'i blo gros dang / rdo rje'i blo gros dang / khyad par blo
gros dang / seng+ge'i rnam par rol pa dang / sgra chen po dbyangs kyi rgyal po dang / seng+ge'i sgra sgrog dang / sgra dbyangs brjod pa zab mo sgrog dang /
gos med dang / dri ma kun bral dang / zla ba'i 'od dang / nyi ma'i 'od dang / ye shes kyi 'od dang / ye shes kyi dpal dang / bzang po'i dpal dang / zla ba'i dpal
dang / pad+ma'i dpal dang / rin po che'i dpal dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / bzang skyong la sogs pa skyes bu dam pa bcu drug dang / byams pa la
sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi la sogs pa rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu
rnams dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gsum gyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / lha'i bu shin tu gnod bral la sogs pa gnod bral gyi lha'i
bu rnams dang / lha'i bu kun tu dga' ldan la sogs pa dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / lha'i bu shin tu 'phrul dga' la sogs la 'phrul dga'i ris
kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / lha'i bu dbang byed la sogs pa gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / ded dpon la sogs pa dkar po'i phyogs kyi bdud kyi bu
rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po la sogs pa tshangs pa'i ris kyi lha'i bu thams cad dang / lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu thams cad
dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags pa bzang ris dang / stobs can dang / nor sbyin dang / de dag la sogs pa lha ma yin brgya stong phrag du ma dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang
gzi can dang / rgya mtsho dang / mtha' yas dang / nor rgyas dang / de dag la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po brgya stong du ma dang / dpal gyi gzi brjid la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po'i khye'u
brgya ston du ma dang / klu'i bu mo mang po rnams dang / de ma yin pa gzhan lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang /
lto 'phye chen po brgya stong dag dang yang thabs cig go/ yang de'i tshe ga ya na ga ya mgo'i ri'i dpag tshad bzhi kho ra khor yug tu skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas kyi rdul phra rab tsam
yang gang lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dag gis ma
gang bar gyur pa'i sa'i phyogs sam/ bar snang gi phyogs de med do/ /'khor de lta bu 'dus shing 'khod pa'i dbus na bcom ldan 'das kyi seng+ge'i khri 'phang du dpag tshad
gcig /kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad phyed pa la lha'i ras bcos bu du ma ni/ bting / rin po che'i dril bu g.yer kha'i dra bas ni/ bla bre bres/ dar
gyi lda ldi brgya stong du ma ni/ dbyangs/ me tog sil mas ni/ gtor bzhig bshams te/ seng+ge'i khri da'i kho ra khor yug gi sa'i phyogs de'i nges rdo rje la yid du 'ong zhing
lag mthil ltar mnyam pa dang / chag chag legs par btab pa dang / phyag dar legs par byas pa dang / dri rab tu zhim zhing lha'i me tog brgya stong du mas gtor bar
gyur to| |bcom ldan 'das kyis yongs su longs spyod pa'i phyir phyogs de na gser gyi pad+ma shing rta'i 'khor lo tsam/ 'dab ma brgya stong du ma yod pa/ chu ba ni/ bai DUR+ya/
snying po ni/ in+d+ra nI la/ ze ba ni/ asma gar+b+ha ste/ dri rab tu zhim zhing yid du 'ong la reg na dga' bar 'gyur ba dag skyes par gyur to/ /seng+ge'i khri de'i gra bzhir ha cang yang mi
ring / ha cang yang mi nye ba nas rin po che'i shing srid du dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis/ sboms su rgyang grags gnyis kyis 'khor ba bzhi skyes so/ /seng+ge'i khri legs par bshams
pa de la bcom ldan 'das blo ni/ rab tu rnam par dag/ chos kyi 'khor lo ni/ rab tu bskor/ bdud dang phyir rgol ba ni/ bcom/ 'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyis ni/ ma
gos la mi bsnyengs shing mi 'dzem ste/ seng+ge'i ltar bag tsha ba med pa/ mtsho dang 'dra bar dang ste rnyog pa med cing shin tu rnam par dwang ba/ rgya mtsho ltar zab cing gting dpag
bka' la rin po che'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa/ ri rab ltar mngon par 'phags pa/ nyi ma ltar rab tu lhan pa/ zla ba ltar rab tu sim pa/ klu chen po ltar chos kyi char mngon
par 'babs pa/ tshangs pa chen po ltar 'jig rten kun las mngon par 'phags pa/ slob ma shin tu dul ba'i tshogs mtha' yas pa'i 'khor mnga' ba/ brgya byin dang /
tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong rnams kyis zhal du bltas shing ma khengs ma dud par bzhugs te/ 'khor tshogs pa de na lam me/ lhan ne/
lhang de'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de ltar lam me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge ba'i dbu'i gtsug gi gtsug tor gyi gseb nas 'od zer kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba 'od zer gyi 'khor brgya
stong phrag du ma yod pa byung ste/ de byung bas phyogs bcu thams cad du 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad snang bar byas te phyir 'ongs nas bcom ldan 'das la
lan gsum bskor te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas zhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo phye ba'am btsum par yang mi mngon no/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ nyi ma
dang / zla ba'i 'od nam mkha'i khams thams cad kyi gseb tu zhugs kyang nam mkha'i khams kyi gseb phye ba'am btsum par mi mngon pa de bzhin du
de'i tshe na 'od zer de dag zhugs kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo phye ba'am btsum par mi mngon no/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ bye ma'i phung po la mar ram/ 'bru mar ram/ chu
zhugs na mi mngon pa de bzhin du/ de'i tshe na 'od zer de dag zhugs kyang phye ba'am btsum par mi mngon no/ /de nas shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'jig rten gyi
khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na pad+ma can zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na pad+ma'i spyan zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang rkang par ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la 'di lta ste/ theg pa gcig las brtsams nas chos ston te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyan
thos dang rang sangs rgyas dag dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i ming yang med/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na rdzus te skye ba ma gtogs par bud med
dang | mngal na gnas te 'byung zhing skye ba'i sgra'ang mi grag go /'jig rten gyi khams de'i sems can de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi
ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sha stag go /'jig rten gyi khams de na bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / zas kyi bya ba'ang mi shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang
bsam gtan gyi dga' ba'i zas can dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dga' ba'i zas can dang / chos kyi dga' ba'i zas can no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid kyi 'od kyis 'jig rten gyi
khams de khyab cing dri ma med par gyur ba ma gtogs par 'jig rten gyi khams de na zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / gza' dang / skar ma rnams kyi 'od kyang mi shes so/ /'jig rten gyi khams
de lag mthil bzhin du mnyam par gyur pa las 'jig rten gyi khams de na rtswa dang / shing dang / bong ba dang / rtsig pa dang / ri la sogs pa'ang mi snang ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams
de 'dra ba de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba de'i ming thos pa tsam gyis sems can gyi sgrib pa thams cad zad par
'gyur ba zhig gnas te/ de 'od des reg ste bskul nas rang gi gnas nas byung ste bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i spyan de ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom
ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te pad+ma'i snying po la phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag
kyang 'od des reg ste bskul ba dang / rang rang gi gnas nas byung ste bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i spyan ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das
de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/ pad+ma'i snying po la so so ci rigs par 'khod do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam
par sel ba stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga pad+ma'i snying po la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
pa pad+ma'i spyan ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta bu'i 'od bzang po dri ma ma
mchis pa/ rnam par dag pa/ yid du mchi ba/ lus dang sems shin tu dga' bar bgyid pa byung ba 'di su'i mthu lags zhes de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i spyan des byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ nub phyogs
na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyod 'das pa na mi mjed ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba de
bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang rkang par ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha
lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de'i mtshan thos pa tsam gyis sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba zhig bzhugs te/ des 'od bzang po dri ma med pa/ rnam par dag pa/ yid du 'ong ba/ lus dang sems shin tu rnam par dag par
byed pa 'di phyung ngo / /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i spyan de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams
cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan thos pa tsam gyis sems can rnams bla na med pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
pa pad+ma'i spyan des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ de
bzhin gshegs pa des sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ 'di ltar sems can su gang dag gis bdag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i ming thos
pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par shog cig ces smon lam btab bo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams
cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ 'jig rten gyi khams de'i sems can de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog pa lags sam/ bcom
ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ ma yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags
sems can de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan ma thos sam/ bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ thos so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan
'das| de ci'i slad du phyir mi ldog pa ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de dag thams cad ni/ phyir mi ldog pa'ang yin la/ phyir
ldog pa'ang yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar gang de lta bur de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog pa'ang lags la/ phyir ldog pa'ang lags/ bcom ldan 'das
des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan thos las sems can de dag phyir mi ldog pa'i sa bon skyes pa mthong nas sems can de dag phyir mi ldog
par lung ston to/ /mtshan thos pa de kho nas de ma thag tu phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba'ang ma yin te/ de bas na/ rigs kyi bu/ don de nyid rab tu grub par bya ba'i phyir khyod la dpe
bshad do/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ shing la la'i sa bon gyi rnam pa zhig yod de/ sa bon de la sa bon gyi nyes pa thams cad med la/ myu gu skye ba nas rdzogs pa'i
bar du rkyen rnams yod na/ rigs kyi bu/ sa bon de la ji skad ces bya/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ nyes pa thams cad dang bral bas na/ de ni/ yongs su rdzogs pa zhes
bgyi'o| |bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan thos pa dang ldan pa'i phyir mi ldog pa'i sa bon yod pa'i sems can rnams ni/ bla na med
pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa yin no/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i spyan de la byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
de blta ba dang / bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba
dang / btsun par bgyi ba dang / ri mor bgyi ba dang / bkur stir bgyi ba dang / mchod par bgyi ba'i slad du mchi'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de
bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i spyan des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi
bu| de'i dus la bab par shes na khyod song zhig/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i spyad de la byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis kyang
'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag kyang mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams de blta ba dang / bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs
pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la'ang phyag 'tshal ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / btsun par bgyi ba dang / ri mor bgyi ba dang / bkur
stir bgyi ba dang / mchod par bgyi ba'i slad du mchi'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i spyan des byang chub sems dpa' de
dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de'i dus la bab par shes na khyod dengs shig /'jig rten gyi khams der bag yod par gnas pas gnas par
gyis shig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams de'i sems can de dag ni/ rab tu 'dod chags mang ba/ zhe sdang mang ba/ gti mug mang ba/ dge sbyong du mi
'dzin pa/ bram zer mi 'dzin pa/ phar mi shes pa/ mar mi shes pa/ chos ma yin pa 'dod pa mang ba/ brlang ba/ gtum pa/ zhe gcod pa/ mu cor smra ba/ pho theg can/
g.yeng ba/ brkam pa/ le lo can/ ngan pa'i ngan tshul can/ sdig pa'i chos can/ phrag dog dang ser snas yongs su dkris pa/ nyon mongs pa du mas nye bar nyon mongs par
gyur pa rnams te/ sems can de 'dra ba de dag gi nang na de bzhin gshegs pa de chos ston to/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang 'di
'dra ba'i sems can rnams kyi nang na chos ston pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dka' ba mdzad pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin no/ /rigs
kyi bu dag /de de bzhin te/ gang 'di 'dra ba'i sems can rnams kyi nang na chos ston pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dka' ba mdzad pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu
dag/ gang de lta bur kun nas nyon mongs par gyur pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na dge ba'i sems gcig tsam bskyed pa'i sems can de dag kyang dka' ba byed pa yin no/ /de
ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang yongs su dag pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can yongs su dag pa yod pa lta ci ngo mtshar gyi/ gang dag de ltar kun nas nyon mongs par gyur
pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na se gol gtogs pa srid du'ang dad pa rnyed pa dang / se gol gtogs pa srid du'ang sangs rgyas la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / chos la skyabs
su 'gro ba dang / dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / se gol gtogs pa srid du'ang tshul khrims yang dag par bzung ste spyod pa 'di ni/ ches ngo mtshar to/ /de
bas kyang gang dag se gol gtogs pa srid du'ang 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa'i sems yang dag par bzung ste gnas pa 'di ni/ ches ngo mtshar to/ /de bas
kyang gang dag se gol gtogs pa srid du'ang snying rje ba'i sems nye bar bzhag ste bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa 'di ni/ ches ngo
mtshar to/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ngo mtshar to/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ ngo mtshar to/ /de nas sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba
la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis legs so bcom ldan 'das zhes gsol nas bcom ldan 'das de las 'di lta bu mthun pa'i rjes su bstan pa
'di mnyan nas bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te rang rang gi gnas nas dong ngo / /dong nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la mchod pa'i phyir la
las ni| rin po che'i shing me tog dang bcas pa/ 'bras bu dang bcas pa/ chu dang zheng du ldan pa rnams mngon par sprul/ la las ni/ bai DUR+ya'i shing rnams/ la las ni/
shel gyi shing rnams/ la las ni/ dpag bsam gyi shing rnams/ la las ni/ gser gyi shing rnams/ la las ni/ me tog gi shing rnams/ la las ni/ 'bras bu'i
shing rnams/ la las ni/ gos kyi sprin rnams/ la las ni/ rgyan gyi sprin rnams/ la las ni/ spos kyi sprin rnams/ la las ni/ phreng ba'i sprin rnams/ la las ni/ phye
ma'i sprin rnams/ la las ni/ gdugs kyi sprin rnams/ la las ni/ rgyal mtshan gyi sprin rnams/ la las ni/ sil snyan gyi sprin rnams mngon par sprul to/ /mngon
par sprul nas gcig tu 'dus te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang lhan cig tu mi mjed kyi 'jig
rten gyi khams ga la ba der dong ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye ma
grogs po dag /mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams sdug bsngal lo/ /de bas na/ gang gis sems can de dag thams cad bde ba mchog gis
bstabs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par bya ba legs par mngon par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' de kun gyis legs so zhes smras nas byang chub sems
dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i ltar mnyan to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par bya
ba mngon par byas pas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i lus las 'od dang ba/ dri ma med pa/ rnam par dag pa/ yid du 'ong ba/ lus
dang sems shin tu dga' bar byed pa byung ste/ 'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams khyab cing snang bar gyur pa dang / gang stong gsum gyi stong chen
po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i sems can dmyal ba pa'i lus su gnas pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas pa'i lus su gnas pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i lus su
gnas pa de dag 'od des reg nas sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dang bral te/ bde zhing khro ba dang gnod sems dang yang bral te phan tshun du pha mar 'du shes par gyur pa dang / gang
yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar mun pa mun nag gang du nyi ma dang / zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/ 'di ltar mthu che
ba| 'di ltar dbang che bar grags pa 'di dag gis kyang lam me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger ma gyur pa de dag kyang 'od des khyab nas snang bar gyur te/ gang der skyes pa'i sems can
dag kyang gcig gis gcig mthong ba dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i gang khor yug gi ri rnams dang / khor yug gi ri chen po rnams
dang / ri btang bzung dang / ri btang bzung chen po rnams dang / de ma yin pa'i ri nag po gzhan de dag kyang 'od des khyab ste snang bar gyur pa dang / blar ni tshangs pa'i 'jig
rten man chad /'og tu mnar med pa'i sems can chen po yan chad de'i bar du gang 'od des snang bar ma byas pa'i sa phyogs de gang yang med pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon
par bya ba mngon par byas so/ /de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gdag gis kyang ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par bya ba mngon par byas pas
zas 'dod pa'i sems can rnams ni/ zas thob/ btung ba 'dod pa rnams ni/ btung ba/ gos 'dod pa rnams ni/ gos/ bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams ni/ bzhon pa/ nor 'dod
pa rnams ni/ nor thob/ long ba rnams ni/ mig thob/ 'on pa rnams ni/ sgra thos/ sgren mo rnams ni/ gos can du gyur/ smyon pa rnams ni/ dran pa thob/ sdug bsngal
ba rnams ni/ bde bar gyur/ sbrum pa rnams ni/ bde bar btsas pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par bya ba mngon par byas so/ /de nas sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel
ba la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad yul ga ya dang ga ya mgo'i ri ga la ba der nye ba dang / skyes bu dam pa de dag nye bar gyur ma thag tu stong gsum
gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che'i dra bas khebs bar kun tu snang ngo / /steng gi bar snang las kyang lha'i pad+ma'i char mngon par rab tu phab bo/ /lha'i
me tog gi sprin rnams dang / lha'i shing tog gi sprin rnams dang / lha'i phreng ba'i sprin rnams dang / lha'i spos kyi sprin rnams dang / lha'i gos kyi sprin rnams dang / lha'i
phye ma'i sprin rnams dang / lha'i chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyi sprin gyi char mngon par rab tu phab bo/ /de dag mngon par rab tu phab pas sems
can gang la reg pa de dag thams cad rab tu bde bar gyur/ yul ga ya dang ga ya mgo'i ri la shing tha mal pa dang / sa phyogs tha mal pa gang yod pa de dag thams cad kyang
med par gyur par snang ngo / /sa phyogs de dag rin po che'i shing rnams dang / dpag bsam gyi shing rnams dang / me tog gi shing rnams dang / 'bras bu'i shing rnams dang /
tsan+dan gyi shing rnams dang / a ga ru'i shing rnams kun tu snang ste/ de dag kun tu bzang por 'dug par gyur to/ /bar snang las lha'i sil snyan dag kyang sgra 'byin cing sil
snyan de dag las 'di lta bu'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang byung ngo / /lum+bi'i tshal rab mchog tu gang skyes pa/ /mnyam med gzhar yang nyon mongs dbang mi 'gyur/ /
nam mkha' mtshungs mnyam de la phyag 'tshal du/ /ri bo mchog rab 'di la bdag cag lhags/ /byang chub mchog sus byang chub shing dbang drung / /bdud kyi sde stobs bcom
nas sangs rgyas pa/ /dri med gzi ldan de la phyag 'tshal du/ /ri bo mchog rab 'di la bdag cag lhags/ /chos tshul 'di dag sgyu ma smig rgyu dang / /chu zla 'dra bar gang gis
rtogs gyur pa/ /bsod nams zhing rab de la phyag 'tshal du/ /ri bo mchog rab 'di la bdag cag lhags/ /chos rnams sna tshogs 'ja' dang 'dra ba dang / /
gar mkhan tshon 'drar gang gis rab rtogs pa/ /mi g.yo bsod nams gter la phyag 'tshal du/ /ri bo mchog rab 'di la bdag cag lhags/ /gang gis bskal pa brgya
phrag mang por ni/ /thugs rje'i thugs kyi tshogs kun rdzogs mdzad pa/ /dri med zla zhal de la phyag 'tshal du/ /ri bo mchog rab 'di la bdag cag lhags/ /byang chub sems
dpa' bye ba brgya mang dang / /lha yi tshogs kyis de bzhin gang mchod pa/ /gti mug mun bral de la phyag 'tshal du/ /ri bo mchog rab 'di la bdag cag lhags/ /gang gis
mchog gi chos kyi gter brnyes shing / /thugs rje nyid kyis 'jig rten dag la btang / /mnyam med phan mdzad de la phyag 'tshal du/ /ri bo mchog rab 'di la bdag cag
lhags| |gang zhig thugs zhi rtag par byams pa'i yid/ /pad+ma chus ltar nyon mongs ma gos pa/ /yon tan mchog rab mnga' la phyag 'tshal du/ /ri bo mchog rab 'di
la bdag cag lhags/ /mtshan gyi me tog rgyas pa yongs su dag pa'i sku/ /dpe byad bzang po'i 'bru chags 'gro ba'i 'tsho ba gang / /yal ga mtha' yas rin chen shing
la phyag 'tshal du/ /bdag cag thams cad lhan cig mchod pa thogs te lhags/ /tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ma thag tu de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud+gal gyi bu chen po stan
las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom
ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sngon ma thos/ sngon ma mthong ba'i snga ltas gda' ba 'di dag su'i lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom
ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud+gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /maud+gal gyi bu/ shar na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung
gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma can zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma'i spyan
zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs so/ /'tsho'o/ /gzhes so/ /chos ston to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa
thams cad rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs pa dang / de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gang skyes
bu dam pa de nyid dang lhan cig tu mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'ongs pa de dag gi snga ltas 'di yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad
ces bka' stsal ma thag tu de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas bskor cing
mdun du bdar te rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der 'ongs te phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
mgo bos phyag btsal te byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su
bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ /grags chen shes rab chen po pa/ /thub chen dpa' bo chen po pa/ /srid pa'i mya ngan rgal ba po/ /nyon mongs rgal la phyag
'tshal lo/ /thams cad du yang tha le ste/ /kun nas rab tu lhan ner bzhugs/ /kun nas rnam par grol ba po/ /phyag 'tshal mi mtshungs mtshungs med la/ /rab tu mi sgul
ri bo bzhin/ /gting tshod yangs pa rgya mtsho 'dra/ /mu stegs kun nas mi bskyod pa/ /chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba na/ /gzod nas zhi
zhing ma skyes pa/ /rang bzhin mya ngan 'das pa yi/ /chos rnams mgon po khyod kyis bstan/ /la la la ni lam yang bstan/ /la la yang dag nyid la bkod/ /la la yang dag mya
ngan bzlas/ /la la byang chub lung yang bstan/ /bag la nyal dang bsam pa mkhyen/ /khyod kyis mi mkhyen ci yang med/ /de phyir 'dul ba'i bya ba rnams/ /gzigs pas khyod
kyi bka' 'grub bo/ /byang chub snying por bzhugs pa na/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang / /dri ma sna tshogs gzhan rnams kyang / /khyod kyi ye shes me yis bsregs/ /rgal
nas sems can rnams sgrol zhing / /grol nas skye rgu sgrol mdzad de/ /srid pa'i mya ngan 'khyams pa yi/ /'jig rten tshol ba khyod lags so/ /srid pa'i btson rar sems can
dag /yun ring mi shes gnyid log rnams/ /sad par mdzad pa mgon po khyod/ /gnyen gyur khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khyod kyi sras mchog 'di dag kyang / /thams cad byang chub
slad du zhugs/ /dam pa'i chos ni nyan 'tshal na/ /'dren pas de dag bstan du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel
bas tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ste pad+ma'i snying po la phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /byang chub sems
dpa' de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas pad+ma'i snying po la so so ci rigs par 'khod do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa
thams cad rnam par sel ba stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga pad+ma'i snying po la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba
de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la
skabs phye na/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/ /de skad ces
gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /skyes bu dam pa khyod la de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyis rtag tu skabs phye'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa la khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / dris pa lung bstan pa de dang de nyid kyis ngas khyod
kyi sems rangs par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs phye ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad
ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa rnams
lags| ji ltar na/ bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ bsam gtan phun sum tshogs pa rnams
lags| ji ltar na/ shes rab phun sum tshogs pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ thabs mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ smon lam phun sum tshogs pa rnams lags/ ji ltar
na| stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sa dang mtshungs pa
rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ chu dang mtshungs pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ me dang mtshungs pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ rlung mar dang mtshungs pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ nam
mkha' dang mtshungs pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ zla ba lta bu rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ nyi ma lta bu rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ seng+ge lta bu rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ dul ba
rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ cang shes pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ pad+ma lta bu rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems rgya che ba rnams lags/
ji ltar na/ sems rnam par dag pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ sems nem nur ma mchis pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems
dpa' blo rgya mtsho lta bu rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ blo zhi ba pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rig pa'i spobs pa can rnams lags/ ji ltar
na| grol ba'i spobs pa can rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ rnam par dag pa'i spobs pa can rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ sems can thams cad mgu bar byed pa'i spobs pa can
rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshig gzung ba rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos brjod
rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ chos kyi dbyings la mkhas pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub
sems dpa' stong pa nyid spyod yul ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ smon lam la gnas pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams
lags| ji ltar na/ byams pa'i bdag nyid can rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ dga' ba la gnas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar
na| btang snyoms la gnas pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pas rnam par rol pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ mi khom pa brgyad rnam
par spangs pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ byang chub kyi sems kyi ma stor ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ skye ba dran pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang ma bral
ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spangs pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i chos nyid thob
par 'gyur ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ lus rdo rje ltar sra ba rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ lam
la mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ lam la log par spyod pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sems mnyam par bzhag
pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' phyag dar khrod pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ chos gos gsum pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ phying pa can
rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' bsod snyoms pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ stan gcig pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ zas phyis mi len pa
rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' dgon pa pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ shing drung pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ bla gab med pa
rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ dur khrod pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ tsog pus rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ gzhi ji bzhin pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems
dpa' rnal 'byor spyod pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ mdo sde 'dzin pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ 'dul ba 'dzin pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na ma mo 'dzin pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ cho ga dang /
spyod yul dang / spyod pa dang / smon lam phun sum tshogs pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ ser sna dang phrag dog dang bral ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ sems can thams cad la sems
snyoms pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang rim gro bgyid pa la mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ nga rgyal bcom pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/
dad pa mang pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ kun rdzob la mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ don dam pa la mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ rten cing 'brel pa 'byung ba la mkhas
pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ bdag shes pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ 'jig rten shes pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems
dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ mngal gyi dri mas ma gos par skye ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par byung ba rnams la
ji ltar na/ 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ yid yongs su mi skyo ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bka' bzhin bgyid pa rnams lags/
ji ltar na/ bzhin 'dzum zhing khro gnyer ma mchis pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ mang du thos pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/
chos kyi rgyal po'i sras rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong bas bsu ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ bsam pa dang / bag la nyal 'tshal ba rnams
lags/ ji ltar na/ sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i cho ga 'tshal ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ des pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ 'grogs na bde ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na/
bsdu ba'i dngos po la mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ tshul du shis pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ gnas bca' ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ rtsi'i rgyal po'i shing chen po lta bu rnams
lags/ ji ltar na/ bsod nams bgyi ba la brtson pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ sprul pa la mkhas pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' dag /
myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ legs so legs so/ /yang rigs kyi bu/ khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /

skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir zhugs shing / de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la
khyod 'di lta bu'i don 'dri bar sems pa legs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ de'i phyir legs par shin tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ legs
so| |zhes byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi
bu| chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos kyi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnam sbyin/ mi 'jigs
pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ zang zing gi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ lan du phan 'dogs pa la mi re ba'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ snying
rje ba'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ mi brnyas pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ bsti stang gi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ mchod pa dang rim gro'i sbyin
pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ mi gnas pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ yongs su dag pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la ji ltar na/
byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' bzang zing med pa'i sems kyis chos rnams 'dzin cing kun chub par
byed de| rnyed pa dang bkur sti'i phyir ma yin/ shes kyi khe 'dod pa'i phyir ma yin/ grags pa 'dod pa'i phyir ma yin te/ gzhan du na 'di ltar sems can 'di dag gi sdug bsngal thams
cad ji ltar zad par bya snyam ste/ chos de dag kyang zang zing med pa'i sems kyis gnyis su med par gzhan dag la'ang yang dag par ston to/ /ji ltar rgyal po'am/ blon po chen po la yang
dag par ston pa de ltar gdol pa'am/ gdol bu la'ang dag par ston na/ de ma yin pa grong rdal gyi mi dang / yul gyi mi gzhan dag lta ci smos/ chos kyi sbyin pa des khengs par yang mi
'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe
na| rigs kyi bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' bdag gis dbyig pa bor ba dang / mtshon cha bor ba yin te/ gzhan dag kyang bslab pa de nyid la gzhog go/
de sems can thams cad la par 'du shes pa yin/ mar 'du shes pa yin/ bur 'du shes pa yin/ gnyen bshes su 'du shes pa yin/ nye du'am snag gi gnyen mtshams dag
kyang rung bar 'du shes pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pas kyang skye ba 'pho ba de dang de dag tu sems can gyi ris su gang khyod kyi pha'am/
ma'am| bu'am/ gnyen bshes sam/ nye du'am/ snag gi gnyen mtshams dag gang yang rung ba'i gnas su ma gyur pa'i sems can de lta bu med do/ /zhes gsungs so snyam nas
de srog chags su gyur pa phra mo'i phyir yang bdag gi sha dag gis kyang phan 'dogs na/ srog chags chen po pa gzhan la lta ci smos te/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' mi 'jigs
pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' zang zing gi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems
can gang mi dge ba'i las byed pa rab tu mthong na/ de dag zang zing gis sdud cing / zang zing gis bsdus nas mi dge ba'i gnas de nas bslang ste dge ba'i gnas su 'god do/ /de'ang
'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang sbyin pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub bo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa sbyin pa na mi dge ba'i chos phrag dog dang / ser sna dang /
ngan sems gsum spangs pa yin no/ /zhes gsungs te/ de bas na/ bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su bslab cing sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o/ /snyam ste/ de sbyin pa'ang sbyin zhing sbyin
pa des khengs par yang mi 'gyur te/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' zang zing gi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' lan du phan 'dogs pa la mi ro/
ba'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa sbyin pa'ang 'dod pa'i phyir sbyin pa mi sbyin/ phan 'dogs su re ba'i phyir ma yin/ don gyi phyir ma yin/ g.yog
gi phyir ma yin/ 'jig rten gyi tshul gyis phyir ma yin gyi/ gzhan du na 'di snyam du sems te/ gang byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa'i ngang tshul can du 'gyur ba 'di ni/ chos nyid yin no snyam
ste| de de'i rgyu/ de'i rkyen/ de'i gzhis phan btags pa'i lan du phan 'dogs pa thams cad la mi re bar sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' lan du phan 'dogs pa
la mi re ba'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' snying rje ba'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems can
sdug bsngal ba dang / bkres pa dang / skom pa dang / gcer bu dang / gos ngan pa dang / bgo ba ngan pa dang / mgon med pa dang / dpung gnyen med pa dang / skyabs
med pa dang / gnas med pa dang / rten med pa lta bu'i bsod nams med pa dag mthong na/ de dag la snying rje ba'i sems rab tu bskyed cing / de 'di snyam du sems te/ sems can gang
dag gi phyir bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i sems can de dag ni/ sdug bsngal ba/ mgon med pa/ dpung gnyen med pa/ skyabs
med pa| gnas med pa/ rten med pa 'di dag yin te/ kun tu 'khyams na nam zhig bdag sems can de dag gi mgon dang / dbung gnyen dang / skyabs dang / gnas dang / rten du
'gyur snyam nas de snying rje rab tu mi bzod de/ bdog pa ci yod pa'i dngos pos sems can de dag la phan 'dogs so/ /phan btags pa'i mod la skyes pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des
kyang khengs par mi 'gyur te/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' snying rje ba'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' mi bsnyes pa'i sbyin pa phun sum
tshogs pa yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa sbyin pa na bor ba'i sbyin pa mi sbyin/ brnyas shing sbyin pa mi sbyin/ gshe zhing sbyin pa mi sbyin/ nyon mongs shing sbyin pa mi sbyin/
phyug pas rgyags shing dregs te sbyin pa mi sbyin/ grags pa 'dod cing sbyin pa mi sbyin/ mang du thos pas rgyags shing dregs pas sbyin pa mi sbyin gyi/ ci sbyin pa de'ang bsti stang du byas shing
sbyin pa sbyin par byed do/ /btsun par byas shing sbyin pa sbyin par byed do/ /ri mor byas shing sbyin pa sbyin par byed do/ /de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' mi brnyas pa'i sbyin pa phun sum
tshogs pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' bsti stang gi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' slob dpon dang / mkhan po dang / bla ma lta bu dang / tshangs pa
mtshungs par spyod pa dag mthong na/ lus kyis gus pa dang bcas pa yin/ sems kyis ri mo dang bcas pa yin te/ des gus pa bskyed/ ri mo bskyed nas gus par smra ba dang / phyag
'tshal ba dang / bsu ba dang / thal mo sbyar ba dang / 'dud pa'i las dag byed do/ /de dag gi dge ba dang ldan pa'i bya ba de dang de dag la'ang grogs su 'gyur te/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems
dpa' bsti stang gi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' mchod pa dang rim gro'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs
rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la bya ba dag byed de/ ji ltar na/ sangs rgyas la bya ba dag byed ce na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten dag dang / de bzhin gshegs
pa'i sku gzugs la spos dang / me tog gam/ bdug gam/ byug pa'am/ skyang nul lam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten zhig pa bcos pa dag gis
te| de ltar na/ sangs rgyas la bya ba dag byed do/ /ji ltar na/ chos la bya ba dang byed ces na/ de chos nyan to/ /klog go/ 'chang ngo / /yi ger 'bri'o/ /kha ton byed do/ /kun chub par byed do/ /
sems so/ /ma log par sgom pa'i sbyor bas goms par byed de/ de ltar na/ chos la bya ba dag byed do/ /ji ltar na/ dge 'dun la bya ba dag byed ces na/ de gos dang / bsod snyoms
dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i rkyen sman dang / yo byad rnams dang / chung du na chu grang mo khyor gang tsam yang dge 'dun la 'bul te/ de ltar na/ dge 'dun la bya ba dag byed de/ de ltar na/
byang chub sems dpa' mchod pa dang rim gro'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' mi gnas pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di
la byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa sbyin pa na/ sbyin pa 'dis bdag lha'am lha la la zhig tu shog cig ce'am/ rgyal po'am rgyal po la la zhig tu shog cig ces de ltar sems mi
skyed de/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' mi gnas pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' yongs su dag pa'i sbyin pa phun sum
tshogs pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa 'di dag ji skad du bshad pa la so sor rtog pa'i rang bzhin can yin te/ sbyin pa ci dang ci sbyin yang sbyin pa de dang de
la so sor rtog pa'i rang bzhin can yin no/ /de de ltar so sor rtog pas gang 'di sbyin pa'i snyes pa dang / sbyin pa'i dri ma dang / sbyin pa'i bar du gcod pa de dag mi 'byung ste/ de ltar sbyin
rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' yongs su dag pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa phun
sum tshogs pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ so sor
thar pa'i sdom pas bsdams pa rnams yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'i sdom pas bsdams pa rnams yin/ nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi yongs su gzung ba dang bral ba
rnams yin/ tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ las kyis 'jigs pa rnams yin/ kha na ma tho bas 'jigs pa rnams yin/ 'jigs par lta ba
rnams yin/ yang dag par blangs pa la brtan pa rnams yin/ mi gnas pa'i tshul khrims pa rnams yin/ 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i tshul khrims pa rnams yin no/ /
rigs kyi bu/ de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' so sor thar pa'i sdom pas bsdams pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin
gshegs pas mdo sde'am/ 'dul ba'am/ gnas gang yang rung ba la la dag tu bslab pa'i gnas 'di dag gang bcas pa de dag ston pas bstan pa'i snyam du sems te/
gnas de dang de dag la shin tu legs par slob kyi/ rigs la 'dod chags bsam yin/ lta ba la 'dod chags pas ma yin/ 'khor ba la 'dod chags pas ma yin/ gang
zag gi skyon gyi phyir bslab pa'i gnas de dang de dag la ri mo med pa ma yin te/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' so sor thar pa'i sdom pas bsdams pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/
byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'i sdom pas bsdams pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du so sor thar pa'i sdom pa tsam gyis
ni| bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pas mdo sde de dang de dag las byang chub sems
dpa'i yang dag par spyad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'i gnas 'di dag gang bcas pa de dag la bdag gis bslab par bya'o/ /zhes rnam par dpyod do/ /byang chub sems
dpa'i yang dag par spyad pa de dag ni/ gang / byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'i gnas de rnams kyang gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gang gi phyir de la sems can rnams dad par
'gyur ba'i gnas ma yin par mi spyod/ yul ma yin par mi spyod/ dus ma yin par mi smra ba yin/ dus mi shes pa ma yin/ yul mi shes pa ma yin/ tshod mi shes pa ma yin te/ de
sems can de rjes su bsrung ba dang / bdag gi byang chub kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir spyod lam phun sum tshogs shing 'jam dpar smra ba dang / dal bus smra ba dang / 'du 'dzi
mi mang ba dang / rab tu dben pa la mngon par phyogs pa dang / bzhin gyi mdangs rab tu dang ba yin te/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' cho ga phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/
byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'i sdom pas bsdams pa yin zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdo sde de dang de dag la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis
bslab pa'i gnas 'di dag gang bcas pa'i gnas de dag la gus par byed pa yin/ brtson par byed pa yin te/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'i
sdom pas bsdams pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi yongs su gdung ba dang bral ba yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'dod chags kyi
yongs su gdung ba'am/ zhe sdang gi yongs su gdung ba'am/ gti mug gi yongs su gdung ba'am/ nyon mongs pa'i yongs su gdung ba gang yang rung ba la la'am/ yo
byad kyis phongs pa'i yongs su gdung ba gang yang rung ba la las yongs su gdung bar mi 'gyur te/ de 'dod chags kyi gnyen po la rten cing 'dod chags skye ba'i rkyen rnams yongs su spang
ngo / /'dod chags kyi gnyen po de ni/ gang / 'dod chags skye ba'i rkyen de dag ni/ gang zhe na/ mi sdug pa sgom pa ni/ 'dod chags kyi gnyen po'o/ /yul gyi bzang mo ni/ 'dod
chags skye ba'i rkyen te/ mi sdug pa sgom pa de gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus 'di la skra dang / spu dang / sen mo dang / so dang / rdul dang / dri ma dang / pags pa dang / sha dang / rus pa

dang / rgyus pa dang / rtsa dang / mkhal ma dang / snying dang / mchin pa dang / glo ba dang / rgyu ma dang / gnye ma dang / pho ba dang / sul mang dang / long ka dang / lgang pa dang / mtsher pa dang / phyi sa

dang / mchi ma dang / rdul dang / snabs dang / ngar snabs dang / zhag dang / chu ser dang / rkang dang / tshil dang / mkhris pa dang / bad kan dang / rnag khrag dang / klad pa dang / klad rgyas dang /
gcin dag yod de/ dngos po de dag la byang chub sems dpa' yongs su rtog pa'i rang bzhin can yin te/ yongs su rtog pa'i rang bzhin can de 'di snyam du byis pa/ blun po/ mi
gsal ba/ mi mkhas pa de'ang dngos po 'di dag shes nas 'dod chags kyi sems mi skyed na/ shes rab dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin can lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam ste/ de ltar na/ byang chub
sems dpa' mi sdug pa sgom pa med pa yin no/ /yul gyi bzang mo de gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpas chags par 'gyur ba'i bud med gzugs bzang ba/ yid du 'ong ba/ mdzes pa/
mig tu sdug pa/ sems 'phrog pa mthong yang des de lta bu dag mthong na 'di ltar yongs su rtog ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang yul ni/ rmi lam dang 'dra ba dag ste/ byung nas med par
'gyur ba yin na/ mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can su zhig rmi lam lta bu'i yul dag la 'dod chags skyed par byed ces gsungs so snyam ste/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'dod chags
kyi gnyen po la rten cing 'dod chags skye ba'i rkyen rnams yongs su spong ngo / /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhe sdang gi gnyen po la rten cing zhe sdang skye ba'i rkyen rnams yongs su spong
zhe na| 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams la byams pa mang ba yin te/ de gzhi gang dang / rgyu gang dang / rkyen gang gis khro zhing gnod sems su 'gyur ba dang / 'khon du 'dzin
par 'gyur ba'i rgyu de dag dang / rkyen de dag yongs su spangs te/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhe sdang gi gnyen po la rten cing zhe sdang skye ba'i rkyen rnams yongs su spong ba yin no/ /ji
ltar na| byang chub sems dpa' gti mug gi gnyen po la rten cing gti mug skye ba'i rkyen rnams yongs su spong zhe na/ de de ltar yongs su rtog pas gti mug
dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /gti mug dang bral bas 'dod pa ma 'byor tam/ yo byad ma 'byor kyang yongs su yi chad pa med de/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa thams
cad kyi yongs su gdung ba dang bral ba yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa dang bral ba yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
gcig pu lkog tu song ste rab tu dben pa la gnas shing 'di ltar bdag ni/ ma 'dres par gnas pa ste/ bdag ni/ rab tu dben pa na 'dug pa'o/ /bdag ni/ de bzhin gshegs
pa'i chos 'dul ba la zhugs pa'o/ /dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze gzhan dag ni/ kun kyang 'dres par gnas pa/ 'du 'dzi mang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'dul ba las nyams
pa'o snyam du sems mi skyed de/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa dang bral ba yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' las kyis
'jigs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang dge slong rnams bsod nams dag gus par bya'o/ /tshul khrims gus par srung ngo //
shes rab gus par sgom mo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bsod nams gus par byas pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni/ 'dod pa dang / 'thad pa dang / dga' ba dang / yid du 'ong bar nyams su myong bar
'gyur ro/ /zhes gsungs so snyam du dpyod do/ /de de ltar mngon par yid ches pas mi dge ba'i chos thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur te/ de ltar na/ las kyis 'jigs pa yin no/ /
ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' kha na ma tho bas 'jigs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' kha na ma tho ba phra mo tsam dag la'ang 'jigs par lta zhing sdig pa chung
du'ang khyad du mi gsod pa yin te/ de 'di snyam du bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang dge slong rnams dug chung dus kyang skyes bu 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong rnams dug chen pos kyang
skyes bu 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du sdig pa chen pos kyang ngan song rnams su phyin par byed do/ /sdig pa chung dus kyang ngan song rnams su phyin par byed do/ /zhes gsungs so snyam
du sems te/ de de ltar yongs su rtog pas kha na ma tho bas 'jigs pa yin te/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' kha na ma tho bas 'jigs pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems
dpa' 'jigs par lta ba yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / grong rdal gyi mi dang / yul gyi mi rnams kyis yid brtan du rung ba yin te/
bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / grong rdal gyi mi dang / yul gyi mi rnams byang chub sems dpa' de gcig pu gnyis su med pa la 'gron bu dang / gser dang / nor
bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru la sogs pa nor dang / yo byad kyi rnam pa dag 'dems kyang de la byang chub sems dpa' brnab sems kyang mi skyed
do| |gal te byang chub sems dpa' mchod rten gyi'am/ dge 'dun gyi dngos po'i phyir las su bskos nas yang dngos po des kyang nye bar mi 'tsho ste/ de 'di snyam du sems shing
bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang byang chub sems dpas ni/ bdag gi lus las sha zos kyang bla'i/ gzhan gyi zas sam/ skom mam/ yo byad kyi rnam pa gang ci'ang rung ba dag ma
byin la| ma gnang bar spyad pa ni/ mi rung ngo / /zhes gsungs so snyam ste/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs par lta ba yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa'
yang dag par blangs pa la brtan pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' la bdud dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis gtses sam/ nor dang / 'khrig pa'i yan lag
gis brjod kyang mi g.yo mi 'gyur zhing nyams par mi 'gyur te/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par blangs pa la brtan pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems
dpa' mi gnas pa'i tshul khrims pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims srung na/ tshul khrims 'dis bdag lhar shog cig ce'am/ lha la lar shog cig ce'am/ rgyal
por shog cig ce'am/ rgyal po la lar shog cig ces sems mi bskyed de/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' mi gnas pa'i tshul khrims pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ ji ltar na/
byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i tshul khrims pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' lus kyis yongs su dag pa yin/ ngag dang / yid kyis yongs
su dag pa yin te/ ji ltar na/ lus kyi yongs su dag pa yin zhe na/ de gang lus kyi ngan du spyod pa 'di dag thams cad du thams cad yongs su spong ste/ lus kyi ngan du spyod pa de dag kyang
gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa ste/ de ltar na/ lus kyis yongs su dag pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ ngag gis yongs
su dag pa yin zhe na/ de gang 'di dag ngag gi ngan du spyod pa de dag thams cad du thams cad yongs su spong ste/ ngag gi ngan du spyod pa de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ brdzun du smra ba
dang / phra ma dang / tshig rtsub po dang / tshig kyal pa ste/ de ltar ngag gis yongs su dag pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ yid kyis yongs su dag pa yin zhe na/ de gang 'di dag yid kyi ngan du
spyod pa de dag thams cad du thams cad yongs su spong ste/ yid kyi ngan du spyod pa de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ brnab sems dang / gnod sems dang / log
par lta ba'o/ /de ltar na/ yid kyi yongs su dag pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i tshul khrims can yin no/ /rigs
kyi bu| chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' bzod
pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nang gi bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ phyi'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/ chos kyi bzod
pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ nyi tshe ba ma yin pa'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ tha
dad med pa'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ dgos pa la mi lta ba'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ rnam par mi 'khrugs pa'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs
pa rnams yin/ snying rje'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ dam bcas pa las sgrol bar byed pa'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ rigs kyi bu/ de la ji ltar
na| byang chub sems dpa' nang gi bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gang 'di dag nang gi mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug
bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa de dag bzod cing dang du len la yongs su yi mi chad de/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' nang gi bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /ji
ltar na| byang chub sems dpa' phyi'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ma las smos pa'am/ pha las smos pa'am/ nye du las smos pa'am/
mkhan po las smos pa'am/ slob dpon las smos pa'i tshig gi lan ngan du brjod pa dang / ngan du smras pa pha rol las thos sam/ sangs rgyas sam/ chos sam/ dge 'dun la mi
snyan par brjod pa thos na/ mi khro zhing gnod par mi sems la 'khon du mi 'dzin te/ de bzod cing dang du len la gnod sems mi mang ba yin te/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa'
phyi'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gang 'di dag mdo sde
zab mo zab mo dag las de bzhin gshegs pas chos bstan pa rgyud chad pa/ mtshams sbyor ba las rnam par grol ba bsdur med pa 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad thog ma nas zhi ba'o//
chos thams cad rang bzhin gyi mya ngan las 'das pa'o/ /zhes bstan pa de dag thos kyang mi 'jigs/ mi dngang / skrag par mi 'gyur te/ chos 'di
dag ma shes ma thos par ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so/ /snyam du sems te/ de'i phyir gang chos 'di dag 'dzin pa dang / sems
pa dang / sgom pa dang / yongs su klog pa dang / mos pa 'di ni/ chos kyi bzod pa zhes bya ste/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /ji ltar
na| byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' khro ba'i bsam pa skyes sam/ gnod sems kyi bsam
pa skyes na/ 'di ltar khro ba 'di gang nas byung / gang du 'gag /gang las 'byung / ji ltar 'byung / ci'i don du 'byung zhes yongs su rtog ste/ des de ltar yongs su brtags na/ khro
ba'i skye ba'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / 'gag pa'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / gang la skye ba de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / ji ltar skye ba de'ang yang dag par rjes su
mi mthong / rkyen gang gis skye ba de'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ de de'i phyir bzod cing dang du len la kun nas ldang ba mi mnga' ba yin te/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems
dpa' sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' nyi tshe ba ma yin pa'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ byang chub sems
dpa' ni/ nyin par bzod la mtshan mo mi bzod pa'am/ mtshan mo bzod la nyin par mi bzod pa'am/ bdag gi yul na bzod la gzhan gyi yul na mi bzod pa'am/ gzhan gyi yul na bzod
la bdag gi yum na mi bzod pa'am/ bshes pa la bzod la mi bshes pa la mi bzod pa'am/ mi bshes pa la bzod la bshes pa la mi bzod pa ma yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' ni/
dus thams cad du'ang bzod/ yul thams cad du'ang bzod/ thams cad la'ang bzod pa yin te/ 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i nyi tshe ba ma yin pa'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no//
ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' tha dad pa med pa'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' pha dang / ma dang / bla ma dang / bu dang / bu mo dang / chung ma dang /
nye du dang / snag gi gnyen mtshams la bzod la/ gzhan la mi bzod pa ma yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' ni/ tha na gdol pa gzhon nu yan chad la'ang bzod de/ de ltar na/ byang chub
sems dpa' tha dad pa med pa'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' dgos pa la mi lta ba'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang
chub sems dpa' don gyi phyir bzod pa ma yin/ 'jigs pa'i phyir ma yin/ phan thogs su re ba'i phyir ma yin/ 'jig rten gyi tshul gyis ma yin no/ /ngo tsha
bas bzod pa ma yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' ni/ rtag par yang bzod pa mang ba yin te/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' dgos pa la mi lta ba'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa
yin no| |ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par mi 'khrug pa'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' nam de la khro ba skyed pa'i rkyen gang gis
zil gyis non na/ khu tshur gyis 'tshog par 'gyur ba'am/ thal mos 'tshog par 'gyur ba'am/ dbyig pas rdeg par 'gyur ba'am/ mtshon gyis 'debs par 'gyur ba'am/
mi gtsigs pa'i tshig gis ngan du brjod par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rkyen ma byung gi bar du bzod pa ma yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' ni/ gal te la la zhig gis brdegs sam/
bsdigs sam/ spyos sam/ brgyad na/ de la byang chub sems dpas 'di snyam du bdag nyid kyis las 'di dag byas te bdag nyid la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /mas ma byas/
phas ma byas/ nye du dang / snag gi gnyen mtshams gang yang rung ba dag gis ma byas te/ las 'di dag bdag nyid kyis byas pas/ de'i phyir bdag nyid la rnam par smin par
'gyur gyi/ phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ de bzhin du chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du nang gi
sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ de bzhin du chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur ro snyam du sems gzhag par bya'o/ /de de
ltar ma log par rtog pas de'i rgyu/ de'i rkyen/ de'i gzhis rnam par dkrugs kyang bzod/ rnam par ma dkrugs kyang bzod de/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par mi 'khrug
pa'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' snying rje'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rgyal po'am/ blon po
chen po phyug cing nor mang ba/ longs spyod che ba/ sems can sdug bsngal ba rnams kyi bdag por 'gyur la/ de la sems can gzhan de dag gi mi snyan par brjod kyang rung / kyal
kyang rung / gtses kyang rung ste/ mi khro zhing gnod sems su mi byed la/ bdag por gyur pa lta bur mi ston gyi/ gzhan du na de 'di snyam du sems can 'di dag ni/ bdag nyid kyis bzung
ba ste| sems can 'di dag ni/ bdag nyid kyis yongs su bskyang bar bya ba yin la/ de ltar yongs su bsrung ba na brlag par bya ba ni/ bdag gi mi cha'o/ /zhes de de'i phyir snying rje'i sems nye
bar bzhag ste bzod cing dang du len la gnod sems mi mang ba yin te/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' snying rje'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /
rigs kyi bu/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' dam bcas pa las sgrol ba'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du bdag gis de
bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi spyan sngar bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
sangs rgyas te 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i 'dam du byid ba'i sems can rnams bsgral bar bgyi'o/ /zhes seng+ge'i sgra bsgrags kyi/ de ltar na/ sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang /
sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dul ba dang zhi ba la rab tu bkod par brtson pa la bdag nyid khro ba mang ba dang / gnod sems mang ba dang / mi bzod
pa mang ba dang / phog snya byed pa ni/ bdag gi mi cha'o snyam du sems so/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sman pa thur ma can zhig yod la/ sems can rnams kyang rab rib
kyis ldongs par gyur nas sman pa des 'di snyam du bdag gis sems can 'di dag gi rab rib kyi skyon bsal bar bya'o/ /zhes bsam la/ de nas sman pa de bdag nyid kyang ldongs
par gyur na/ rigs kyi bu/ de ji snyam du sems/ ji ga sman pa des sems can de dag gi rab rib kyi skyon thams cad bsal bar nus sam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ma lags
so| |bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'di ltar 'jig rten mi shes pa'i rab rib kyis ldongs pa'i gti mug gi dri ma
shes rab kyi mig gis bsal bar 'dod la/ bdag nyid kyang mi shes pa'i rab rib kyis ldongs na bdag gi mi cha'o snyam du sems te/ de de'i phyir bzod cing dang du len la gnod sems
mi mang ba yin te/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' dam bcas pa las sgrol bar byed pa'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang
chub sems dpa' bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no/ /'phags pa dkon mchog sprin/ bam po gnyis pa/ rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems
dpa' brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rdo rje lta bu'i brtson 'grus can rnams yin/ mi 'phrog pa'i brtson 'grus can rnams yin/ mtha'
gnyis dang bral ba'i brtson 'grus can rnams yin/ rlabs po che'i brtson 'grus can rnams yin/ 'bar ba'i brtson 'grus can rnams yin/ rgyun du chud pa'i brtson 'grus can
rnams yin/ rnam par dag pa'i brtson 'grus can rnams yin/ thun mong ma yin pa'i brtson 'grus can rnams yin/ mi brnyas pa'i brtson 'grus can rnams
yin| snyems pa med pa'i brtson 'grus can rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la ji ltar na/ rdo rje lta bu'i brtson 'grus can rnams yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di la byang chub sems
dpa' sems can phyi khams yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba dang / ma rgal ba bsgral ba dang / ma grol ba dgrol ba dang / dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs
dbyung ba dang / mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin te/ de de ltar brtson 'grus brtsams shing
gnas pa'i drung du bdud sdig can 'ongs nas byang chub sems dpa' de la rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta bu'i brtson 'grus thong zhig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ ngas kyang sems can gyi
khams yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba dang / ma rgal ba bsgral ba dang / ma grol ba dgrol ba dang / dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung ba dang / mngon
par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus 'di lta bu brtsams te/ de ni/ rdzun dang 'drid pa'i chos can/ byis pa'i skye bo
slu ba'o| |rigs kyi bu/ ngas ni/ sems can brtson 'grus brtsams pa gcig gis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par ma
shes so| |rigs kyi bu/ ngas ni/ sems can bye ba du ma nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas yongs su mya ngan las 'das par ngas shes kyi/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis de'i
phyir brtson 'grus zlog cig /don med par nyon mongs pa la sten pa por gyur ta re zhes dad pa dang bral bar byed cing kyal ka byed kyang de la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam dud sems te/ kye
ma 'di ni/ bdud sdig can bdag la kyal ka byed par 'dod do snyam ste/ des de ltar shes nas bdud sdig can de la 'di skad du/ sdig can/ khyod bya ba nyung du gyis shig /'jig rten gyi
bsko sham gyis khyod la ci zhig bya/ sdig can/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang las bdag gir bya ba ni/ 'jig rten yin te/ las kyi bgo skal la spyod pa'o/ /las kyi skye gnas pa'o/ /las
la rten pa'o/ /zhes gsungs te/ sdig can/ khyod kyang las bdag gir bya ba yin te/ las kyi bgo skal la spyod pa/ las kyi skye gnas pa/ las la rten pa yin gyi/ sdig can/ khyod gang nas
'ongs pa'i lam nas song zhig /nga la kyal ka byas pas khyod yun ring por don med pa dang / gnod pa dang / sdug bsngal bar gyur ta re zhes bsgo'o/ /bdud sdig can de'ang bdag gi sems ni/
sems kyi tshor bar rig nas yibs yibs te de nyid du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' bdud thams cad dam/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha
thams cad kyis kyal ka byas te dad pa dang dbral bar byas kyang mi 'gyur/ mi 'dzum/ zhum par mi 'gyur te/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje lta bu'i brtson 'grus can
yin no| |ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' mi 'phrog pa'i brtson 'grus can yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i rnam pa ji lta bus yun ring
po nas theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' de la grangs su'ang nye bar mi 'gro /cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang / rgyu'i
bar du'ang nye bar mi 'gro na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad lta ci smos te/ de'i sems 'byung ba re re la brtson 'grus kyi stobs bskyed pas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
cad yongs su 'dzim cing / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos thams cad rab tu spong ba de lta bu'i brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' mi 'phrog pa'i brtson 'grus can
yin no| |ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' mtha' gnyis dang bral ba'i brtson 'grus can yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ha cang brtun ngas pa'am/ ha cang zhan pa'i brtson
'grus mi rtsom ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ha cang brtun ngas pa'i brtson 'grus ni/ yab yab por 'gyur/ ha cang zhan pa ni/ le lor 'gyur te/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' mtha' gnyis
dang bral ba'i brtson 'grus can yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rlabs po che'i brtson 'grus can yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar brtson 'grus rtsom
ste| de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ci 'dra bar bdag gi lus kyang de dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi gtsug bltar mi snang ba dang / 'od 'dom gang pa dang / mtshan
dang dpe byad bzang po phun sum tshogs pa dang / ye shes thogs pa med cing mtha' yas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi che ba khyu mchog de'ang bdag la'ang yod
par 'gyur ro/ /zhes brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rlabs po che'i brtson 'grus can yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'bar ba'i brtson
'grus can yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gser ram/ nor bu rin po che chen po dri ma dang skyon thams cad dang bral ba ni/ lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge ste/ de ni/ a la la
'bar ba'i gser ro/ /a la la 'bar ba'i nor bu rin po che zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyang brtson 'grus kyi dri ma dang skyon thams cad dang bral ba
yin no| |brtson 'grus kyi dri ma dang skyon de dag gang zhe na/ le lo ni/ brtson 'grus kyi dri ma dang skyon no/ /snyom las ni/ brtson 'grus kyi dri ma dang skyon
no| |zas la tshod mi shes pa ni/ brtson 'grus kyi dri ma dang skyon no/ /bdag mi shes pa ni/ brtson 'grus kyi dri ma dang skyon no/ /tshul bzhin ma yin pa ni/ brtson 'grus kyi dri ma dang
skyon no| |'du 'dzi ni/ brtson 'grus kyi dri ma dang skyon te/ de dag ni/ brtson 'grus kyi dri ma dang / brtson 'grus kyi skyon zhes bya'o/ /de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' la med
pa yin te/ de'i phyir brtson 'grus de 'bar zhing dri ma med pa dang / 'od gsal zhing yongs su dag pa dang / yongs su byang ba yin no/ /de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'bar ba'i
brtson 'grus can yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyun du chud pa'i brtson 'grus can yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' spyod lam thams cad du brtson
'grus rtsom ste/ ci nas kyang lus skyo bar mi 'gyur ba dang / sems skyo bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar rtsom pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus rgyun du chud pa zhes bya ste/ de
ltar na| byang chub sems dpa' rgyun du chud pa'i brtson 'grus can yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dag pa'i brtson 'grus can yin zhe na/ de ltar rgyun du
chud pa'i brtson 'grus can de'i gang sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos byang chub kyi lam gyi bar du gcod pa gnod pa dang ldan pa de dag spangs pa yin/ gang yang 'di dag dge ba'i chos mya ngan las 'das pa
dang mthun pa/ byang chub kyi lam gyi tshogs dang mthun pa/ byang chub kyi phyogs byang chub tu 'brang ba de dag 'phel ba dang / rgyas pa dang / yangs par 'gyur te/ de la mi dge ba'i sems skye ba
phra zhing chung ba 'ga' yang mi skye na/ che ba lta ci smos te/ de ni/ rnam par dag pa'i brtson 'grus zhes bya ste/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dag pa'i brtson 'grus can yin
no| |ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' thun mong ma yin pa'i brtson 'grus can yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gal te phyogs bcu kun tu 'jig
rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed cig mnar med pa'i me'i phung po chen pos byur bur gang par gyur la/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'das pa na sems can gcig cig sdug
bsngal zhing skyabs med/ mgon med de/ gnas med/ rten med pa zhig yod na'ang sems can gcig po de'i don gyi phyir me'i phung po de la rkang gis 'bogs te 'jig rten gyi khams
de dag 'das nas sems can gcig po de dag thar par bya bar bdag spro na/ sdug bsngal phal pa lta ci zhig smos snyam ste/ de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus nyan thos
dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / mu stegs can thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa zhes bya ste/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' thun mong ma yin pa'i
brtson 'grus can yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' mi brnyas pa'i brtson 'grus can yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du mir gyur pas ni/ byang
chub thob par dka' ste/ bdag gi brtson 'grus 'di ni/ chung shing zhan la bdag kyang le lo can te/ byang chub ni/ mgo'i thod la me 'bar ba bzhin du bskal pa mang po/ /bskal pa
brgya phrag mang po/ /bskal pa stong phrag mang po/ /bskal pa brgya stong phrag mang por sgrub dgos pas bdag ni/ de lta bu'i khur bkur bar mi spro'o snyam du sems mi skyed de/ byang
chub sems dpas ni/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de dag dang / gang mngon
par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de dag dang / gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang tshul 'di 'dra ba dang / lam 'di 'dra ba dang / brtson 'grus 'di 'dra bas
mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs
bar gyur pa sha stag las mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa ma yin gyi/ bdag kyang ci nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
'gyur par sems can thams cad dang thun mong gi brtson 'grus dang / sems can thams cad la dmigs pa'i brtson 'grus kyis bdag gis kyang de lta de ltar btsal lo 'bad do/ /
bdag sems can thams cad la phan par brtson pa la ni/ sems can dmyal ba na gnas kyang bla'i/ bdag la phan par brtson na mya ngan las 'das pa ni/ ma yin no snyam du sems
bskyed par bya ste/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' mi brnyas pa'i brtson 'grus can yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' snyems pa med pa'i brtson 'grus can
yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus rtsom na brtson 'grus de'i ro myang bar mi byed de/ brtson 'grus des gzhan la mi smod/ bdag la mi bstod de/ de 'di snyam du
shes rab dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin can su zhig bdag gi las la brtson pas gzhan la smod snyam du sems te/ rigs kyi bu/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' snyems pa med pa'i
brtson 'grus can yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan
na| byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bsod nams kyis brtan pa rnams yin/ skyo ba
mang ba rnams yin/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa rnams yin/ mang du thos pa rnams yin/ ma log par gdams ngag sgom pa la brtson pa rnams yin/ chos kyi rjes su mthun
pa'i chos la zhugs pa rnams yin/ dbang po rno ba rnams yin/ sems la mkhas pa rnams yin/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la mkhas pa rnams yin/ de la ma zhen pa rnams
yin no| /rigs kyi bu/ de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams kyis brtan pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' theg pa chen po la dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu
bsags shing tshe rabs tha dad pa dang de dag tu spyad pa legs par spyad pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba yin te/ de bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen
po lta bu'am/ rgyal rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu'am/ khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu gang dang gang du skyes kyang khyim de'i mi dad pa yin te/ de skyes nas kyang
rgyu de dag dang / rkyen de dag de bas kyang 'phel zhing rgyas pa dang / yangs par 'gyur te/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams dang mi 'bral ba yin/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag kyang
gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag gam/ byang chub sems dpa' dag go /de skyes nas sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba la goms pas 'di ltar dpyod de/ kye ma skye rgu 'di ni/

sdug bsngal ba'o/ /kye ma skye rgu 'di ni/ nyam thag pa'o/ /kye ma skye rgu 'di ni/ na ba'o/ /kye ma skye rgu 'di ni/ mi gnas pa'o/ /kye ma skye rgu 'di ni/ yun ring po nas nad par gyur pa'o/ /kye ma skye
rgu 'di ni/ gti mug gis ldongs pa'o/ /de'ang 'dod pa'i rgyu dang 'dod pa'i phyir te/ de bas na/ 'jig rten gnas pa de lta bu la bdag gis 'dod pa rnams la bsten pa ni/ bdag gi mi
cha'i| 'dod pa zhes bya ba 'di ni/ yang dag pa ma yin par yongs su brtags pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rnam grangs du mar 'dod pa rnams kyi nyes pa 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa
rnams ni/ gsal shing lta bu'o/ /'dod pa rnams ni/ mtshon shag ti lta bu'o/ /'dod pa rnams ni/ ral gri'i so lta bu'o/ /'dod pa rnams ni/ spu gri'i so lta bu'o/ /'dod pa rnams ni/
sprul gyi mgo lta bu'o/ /'dod pa rnams ni/ dbu ba rdos pa lta bu'o/ /'dod pa rnams ni/ rul pa'o/ /'dod pa rnams ni/ dri nga ba'o/ /zhes gsungs so snyam ste/ de de ltar skyo nas skra dang
kha spu bregs te gos dur smrig dag bgos nas dad pas khyim nas khyim med par yang dag par rab tu 'byung ngo / /de rab tu byung nas ma thob pa thob par bya ba dang / khong du ma chud pa
khong du chud par bya ba dang / mngon du ma byas pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin no/ /de de'i rgyu/ de de'i rkyen de de'i gzhis kun rdzob kyi
bden pa'i tshul du bshad pa dang / don dam pa'i bden pa'i tshul du bshad pa thos pa 'dzin to/ /de gnyis ka la'ang mkhas pas gdams ngag yang dag par sgom mo/ /gdams ngag
ma log par sgom pa la brtson pas chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos la 'jug ste/ chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos de'ang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag
pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting
nge 'dzin to/ /des la ma khong du chud pas dbang po rno ba dang / dbang po gsal ba dang / de shes pa'i dbang po can yin no/ /de dbang po rno zhing dbang po gsal la de shes pa'i dbang
po can yin pas/ dben pa mang ba yin te/ de 'du ba thams cad du thams cad yongs su spong ngo / /'du 'dzi thams cad du thams cad yongs su spong ngo / /smra ba la dga' ba dang / 'dod
pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang / gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang / gtse ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang / lha la rnam par rtog pa thams cad du thams cad yongs su spong ngo| /shes kyi khe
'dod pa dang / grags pa 'dod pa dang / rnyed pa 'dod pa thams cad du thams cad yongs su spong ste/ de lus dang sems rab tu dben pas sems la mkhas pa yin te/ de sems la 'di snyam
du bdag gis sems 'di ci dge ba la spyod dam/ de ste mi dge ba'am/ 'on tam lung du ma bstan pa'am/ chos gang la spyod ces rnam par dpyod de/ gal te dge ba la spyod na de la sems

dga' ba dang / rangs pa dang / mos pa skyed do/ /dge ba'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun no/ /'on te mi dge ba la spyod na de la skyo ba mang
ba dang / rtog pa mang ba yin te/ mi dge ba'i chos de dag spang ba la brtson pa yin no/ /mi dge ba'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug go /de
la 'dod chags rnam pa gsum du rig par bya ste/ chen po dang / 'bring po dang / chung du'o/ /de la 'dod chags chen po gang zhe na/ gang lus thams cad du khyab ste sems kun nas bzung zhing
gnas pa dang / gang gis de la gzhol zhing 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems mi 'thob pa ste/ de la gzhol ba de la ngo tsha ba dang / 'dzem pa thams cad du thams cad med par 'gyur te/
ji ltar na/ ngo tsha ba dang / 'dzem pa thams cad du thams cad med pa yin zhe na/ de gcig pu lkog tu song ste/ de nyid rjes su rnam par sems/ de nyid rjes su rnam par rtog cing / de nyid legs
par shin tu smon pa dang / de nyid la'ang yon tan du lta ba yin te/ de ltar na/ de la ngo tsha ba med pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ 'dzem pa med pa yin zhe na/ de'i rgyu/ de'i rkyen
