klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed kyis bskor nas 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig
brjod du med pa snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams brgya'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor
'jig rten gyi khams nyi shu rtsa lnga'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams lnga'i rdul phra
rab kyi rdul snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams gcig gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor gang+gA'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed kyi bar du lta ci smos/ 'khor bye ba phrag
brgya lta ci smos/ 'khor bye ba phrag lnga bcu lta ci smos/ 'khor bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga lta ci smos/ 'khor bye ba phrag bcu lta ci smos/ 'khor bye ba phrag lnga lta ci smos/ 'khor byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba gcig lta ci smos te/ byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po'i sprin pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa brjod pa/ stong
gsum gyi stong chen po bcu'i tshad tsam gyi char gyis chags pa med cing sgrib pa med la ma 'dres pa'i nam mkha' khyab par phab nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas byang
chub sems dpa' re res kyang nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po'i sprin rgya mtsho grangs med pa brjod pa/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po bcu'i tshad tsam gyis de bzhin
gshegs pa la gtor cing mngon par gtor to/ /gtor cing mngon par gtor nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te lan grangs med par bskor ba byas nas
phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /yang de'i tshe phyogs bcu kun gyi phyogs re rer 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang+gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag
khrig grangs med pa snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho las 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re la byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
gang+gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed gnas par gyur te/ 'on kyang sems can su la'ang gnod pa'am sgrib pa med do//
'jig rten gyi khams rnams dang / gling rnams dang / lhun po dang / lhun po chen po dang / btang bzung dang / btang bzung chen po dang / gangs dang / gangs chen po dang / khor yug dang /
khor yug chen po rnams dang / rgya mtsho dang / rgya mtsho chen po rnams dang / lha'i gnas rnams dang / klu dang / mtsho bran dang / mtshe'u rnams dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal
dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang rnams la'ang gnod pa'am sgrib pa med do/ /sngon ji lta ba de bzhin du phyis kyang bya ba la 'jug par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams
kyis kyang bsam pa ji lta ba dang / 'dul ba ji lta ba de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum du bzhugs par mthong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas
byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i 'khor dang / byang chub sems dpa' kha cig 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs
pa can dag tu thabs rnam pa sna tshogs la mkhas pa'i tshul gyis mtshams sbyor ba'i 'jig rten gyi spyod pa rnams dang / ye shes dang / gzigs pa dang / khams dang / rgyu dang / dmigs pa
dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / gdags pa dang / rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba dag gis sems can gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
yongs su smin par mdzad pa dag ci thams cad 'khor 'dir 'dus sam/ 'on te gzhan yang gang dag ma 'dus pa dag kyang yod dam zhig gu snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub
sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la bka' stsal pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ dper na/
nyan thos chen po rgya mtsho rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ mngon par shes pa la rnam par rtse ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang+gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra
kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed yod par gyur la/ nyan thos chen po de dag re res kyang se gol gtogs pa re re la sems bskyed pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams
rgya mtsho gang+gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed bskyed de/ nyan thos chen po re res kyang sems bskyed pa re res gom pa

'dor pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang+gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed song la/ gom pa re re bor nas kyang

'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang+gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'da' bar byed de/
'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang du nyan thos chen po gcig 'gro ba der gnyis mi 'gro ba de lta bu'i tshul gyis bskal pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang+gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye
ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed du 'gro bar byed do/ /shar phyogs ji lta ba de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / de bzhin du shar lho'i
mtshams dang / de bzhin du lho nub kyi mtshams dang / de bzhin du nub byang gi mtshams dang / de bzhin du byang shar gyi mtshams phyogs su song zhing / nyan thos chen po gcig gang du song ba
der gnyis mi 'gro la de nas mi la la zhig gis 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de dag thams cad grong khyer gcig tu byas la/ srid pa'i rtse mor thug par ra bas kun nas bskor te lag mthil
bzhin du mnyam par gyur cing / rdo dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo med par byas nas bye mas bkang ste byur bur byas la de nas mi des bye ma'i grong khyer de nas bye ma 'bru re re nas blangs la/
grong khyer de'i nang gi bye ma'i 'bru ji snyed yod pa de snyed kyi char gses te rtsi ba'i thabs 'dis bye ma'i 'bru de dag thams cad char gses la/ de nas mi de bye ma'i 'bru char gses pa de dag thams
cad shar phyogs su khyer te bye ma'i 'bru char gses pa de dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'das shing / bye ma'i 'bru char gses pa gcig bor te/ rtsis pa'i thabs 'dis
bye ma'i 'bru char gses pa de dag thams cad bor te shar phyogs su ji lta ba de bzhin du lho dang / de bzhin du nub dang / de bzhin du byang dang / de bzhin du shar lho'i mtshams dang / de bzhin du
lho nub kyi mtshams dang / de bzhin du nub byang gi mtshams dang / de bzhin du byang shar gyi mtshams su bor la/ de nas mi des 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang dag tu bye ma'i 'bru char gses
pa de dag bor ba dang / gang dag tu ma bor ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de dag thams cad grong khyer gcig tu byas la/ srid pa'i rtse mor thug par rabs kun
nas bskor te lag mthil bzhin du mnyam par gyur cing / rdo dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo med par byas nas bye mas bkang ste byur bur byas la/ nga'i byang chub sems dpa' 'khor
'dir 'dus pa 'di dag ni/ bye ma'i grong khyer de las bye ma'i 'bru gcig tsam du zad do/ /nga'i byang chub sems dpa' 'dir ma 'dus pa ni/ grong khyer de'i nang gi bye ma lhag ma ji snyed pa
tsam mo| |da'i lhag ma'i bye ma snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyang ming mthun la rus gcig pa sha stag yin la/ ming tha dad pa dang / rus tha dad pa lta ci
smos| byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku'i kha dog yongs su grub pa mtha' yas pa la sgrub pa'i gzungs thob pa dang /
'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag pa du mar sangs rgyas 'byung ba ston pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa can yongs su sbyong ba dang / sems can gyi khams
bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su smin par byed pa'i khyu mchog tu gyur pa dang ldan pa sha stag go /de nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag gis
byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi nang nas kha cig gi sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i khyu mchog tu gyur pa mthong na ci ma rung snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub
sems dpa' de dag 'khor de'i nang du bsdu ba dang / de dag gi sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i khyu mchog tu gyur pa bstan pa'i se gol gyi sgra mdzad do/ /de'i tshe shar phyogs kyi
'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang dag nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'khor der 'dus pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de dag gi 'dab kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang yin pa de dag

gi ches pha rol 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang+gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rnams 'gul/
rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/ g.yo/ rab tu g.yo/ kun tu rab tu g.yo/ ldeg /rab tu ldeg /kun tu rab tu ldeg /chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem chem/ 'khrug /rab
tu 'khrug /kun tu rab tu 'khrug /'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i 'jig rten gyi khams re re na shar phyogs dma' na nub phyogs mtho/
nub phyogs dma' na shar phyogs mtho/ lho phyogs dma' na byang phyogs mtho/ byang phyogs dma' na lho phyogs mtho/ byang shar mtshams kyi phyogs dma' na lho nub mtshams kyi phyogs
mtho| lho nub mtshams kyi phyogs dma' na byang shar mtshams kyi phyogs mtho/ shar lho mtshams kyi phyogs dma' na nub byang mtshams kyi phyogs mtho/ nub
byang mtshams kyi phyogs dma' na shar lho mtshams kyi phyogs mtho/ mtha' dma' na dbus mtho/ dbus dma' na mtha' mtho ste/ shar phyogs ji lta ba de bzhin du lho phyogs kyang de
dang 'dra'o/ /nub phyogs kyang de dang 'dra'o/ /byang phyogs kyang de dang 'dra'o/ /shar lho'i mtshams dang / lho nub kyi mtshams dang / nub byang gi mtshams dang / byang shar gyi mtshams
kyang de dang 'dra'o/ /steng dang 'og gi phyogs kyang de dang 'dra'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang dag nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'khor der 'dus
pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de dag gi 'dab kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang yin pa de dag gi pha rol gyi'ang ches pha rol 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang+gA'i klung lnga
bcu'i phye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/ g.yo/ rab tu g.yo/
kun tu rab tu g.yo/ /ldeg /rab tu ldeg /kun tu rab tu ldeg /chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem chem/ 'khrug /rab tu 'khrug /kun tu rab tu 'khrug /'ur 'ur/ rab
tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i 'jig rten gyi khams re re'ang shar phyogs dma' na nub phyogs mtho/ nub phyogs dma' na shar phyogs mtho/ lho phyogs
dma' na byang phyogs mtho/ byang phyogs dma' na lho phyogs mtho/ byang shar mtshams kyi phyogs dma' na lho nur mtshams kyi phyogs mtho/ lho nub mtshams kyi phyogs dma' na byang shar
mtshams kyi phyogs mtho/ shar lho mtshams kyi phyogs dma' na nub byang mtshams kyi phyogs mtho/ nub byang mtshams kyi phyogs dma' na shar lho mtshams kyi phyogs mtho/ mtha' dma'
na dbus mtho/ dbus dma' na mtha' mtho bar gyur to/ /yang de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi kun nas phyogs bcur 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang+gA'i klung lnga bcu'i

bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams re re na rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re na 'jig rten gyi

khams rgya mtsho gang+gA'i klung lnga bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gnas par gyur te/ dzam+bu chu bo'i gser gyi stegs bu
rin po ches spras pas ni/ bskor/ rin po che'i tsong tsong gis ni/ mdzes par byas/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan ni/ bsgrengs/ dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba'i bla bres ni/ bres/
tsan+dan sprul gyi snying pos ni/ byugs/ nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po'i dra bas nis/ bkab/ rin po che mthon ka chen po ni/ mig mang ris su bres te/ nor bu rin po

che'i dra ba'i phyogs re re nas kyang mu tig gi rgyan phreng kha dog sna tshogs pa kha dog du ma dang ldan pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med grangs med pa dag 'phyang ngo / /rin po che'i rgyan
phreng kha dog sna tshogs pa kha dog du ma dang ldan pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med grangs med pa dag 'phyang ngo / /dar gyi lda ldi kha dog sna tshogs pa kha dog du ma dang ldan pa
'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med grangs med pa dag 'phyang ngo / /dar gyi chun kor kha dog du ma dang ldan pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med dpag tu med pa dag 'phyang ngo / /dril

bu g.yer ka'i dra ba kha dog sna tshogs pa kha dog du ma dang ldan pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med grangs med pa dag 'phyang ngo / /rin po che'i rgyan phreng dang / mu tig gi rgyan phreng de

dag la rlung gis phog na'ang lha'i sgra yid du 'ong ba dag 'byung ste/ rin po che'i rgyan phreng dang / mu tig gi rgyan phreng rlung gis phog pa de dag las lha'i sgra yid du 'ong ba 'byung ba de lta bu ni/
sil snyan gyi yan lag dpe med pa 'bum phrag bye ba brdungs pa'i slob dpon gyis brdungs pa las kyang de lta bu'i sgra snyan pa mi 'byung ngo / /dril bu g.yer ka'i phreng ba rlung gis phog pa de dag

las kyang lha yul ba'i sgra yid du 'ong zhing zab pa 'byung ba de lta bu ni/ gser gyi snod dzam+bu'i gling gi tshad tsam brdungs pa las kyang de lta bu'i sgra zad cing yid du 'ong ba mi 'byung ngo / /mig mar
ris re re las kyang rin po che'i shing ljon pa re re yod de/ rin po che'i stegs bus ni/ bskor/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / rin po che'i phreng bas ni/ mdzes par byas/ gdugs dang / rgyal
mtshan dang / ba dan ni/ bsgrengs/ rin po che'i rgyan phreng gi rgyan dpag tu med grangs med pas ni/ brgyan/ mu tig gi rgyan phreng gi rgyan dpag tu med grangs med pas kyang brgyan to/ /ras kyi lnga

ldi'i rgyan dpag tu med grangs med pa dang / me tog gi lda ldi'i rgyan dpag tu med pa dang / dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba'i rgyan dpag tu med pas kyang brgyan to/ /rin po che'i shing ljon pa re re'i drung
na'ang rin po che'i seng+ge'i khri 'phang du dpag tshad lnga brgya pa yod de/ rin po che'i stegs bus ni/ bskor/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / rin po che'i phreng bas ni/ mdzes par byas/ gdugs dang /

rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan ni/ bsgrengs/ dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba'i bla bres ni/ bres/ tsan+dan sprul gyi snying pos ni/ byugs/ me tog man+dA ra ba dang / man+dA ra ba chen po dang / many+dzu sha Sha dang / many+dzu
sha Sha chen po dang / mdog mdzes dang / mdog mdzes chen po dang / 'khor lo dang / 'khor lo chen po dang / sna ma dang / bar shi ka dang / ta ru ni dang / bal li dang / go ta ra ni dang / rab tu dri
zhi ma dang / da nu ska ri dang / lha'i sna ma dang / ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / me tog chen po rnams ni/ bkram/ nor bu rin po che

glog gi sgron ma'i rgyan phreng gi rgyan dpag tu med grangs med pa dang / nor bu rin po che nyi zla'i sgron ma'i rgyan phreng rgyan dpag tu med grangs med pa dang / nor bu rin po che snang ba thams cad

'dus pa'i rgyan phreng gi rgyan dpag tu med grangs med pa dang / nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po'i rgyan phreng gi rgyan dpag tu med grangs med pa dang / nor bu rin po che ze ba can gyi rgyan phreng

gi rgyan dang / nor bu rin po che seng+ge'i ze ba can gyi rgyan phreng gyi rgyan dang / nor bu rin po che seng+ge rgyal mtshan gyi rgyan phreng gi rgyan dang / nor bu rin po che brgya byin thogs pa'i rgyan phreng gi rgyan

dang / nor bu rin po che lha thams cad kyi 'od kyi rgyan phreng gi rgyan dang / nor bu rin po che rdo rje'i 'od kyi rgyan phreng gi rgyan dang / nor bu rin po che pad+ma ral gri'i rgyan phreng gi rgyan dang / nor bu rin po

che chu 'dang gi rgyan phreng gi rgyan dang / nor bu rin po che bai DUR+ya'i rgyan phreng gi rgyan dang / nor bu rin po che an+da rnyil gyi rgyan phreng gi rgyan gyis kyang brgyan to/ /nor bu rin po che rdo'i snying po'i rgyan

phreng gi rgyan gyis kyang brgyan to/ /nor bu rin po che dpal gyi snying po'i rgyan phreng gi rgyan gyis kyang brgyan to/ /nor bu rin po che mdzes bkod kyi rgyan phreng gi rgyan gyis kyang brgyan to/ /mu
tig dkar po'i rgyan phreng gi rgyan gyis kyang brgyan to/ /mu tig mthon ka'i rgyan phreng gi rgyan gyis kyang brgyan to/ /mu tig gser po'i rgyan phreng gis kyang brgyan to/ /mu tig dmar po'i

rgyan phreng gi rgyan gyis kyang brgyan to/ /mu tig gser mdog gi rgyan phreng gi rgyan gyis kyang brgyan to/ /mu tig nam mkha'i mdog gi rgyan phreng gi rgyan gyis kyang brgyan to/ /mu tig gi 'bru'i ngos re
re dang / rin po che'i 'bru'i ngos re re nas kyang sems kyi skad cig re re la 'od zer rgya mtsho'i sprin dpag tu med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / mtshungs pa med pa dang / gzhal du med pa dang /

tshad med pa dag byung ngo / /de la 'od zer rgya mtsho'i sprin kha cig las ni/ bsod nams kyi tshogs tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa brjod pa dag byung ngo / /'od zer rgya mtsho'i
sprin kha cig las ni/ ye shes kyi tshogs tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan brjod pa dag byung ngo / /'od zer rgya mtsho'i sprin kha dog gcig las ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa tha dad

pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan brjod pa dag byung ngo / /'od zer rgya mtsho'i sprin kha cig las ni/ sa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa rjod par dag byung ngo / /'od zer
rgya mtsho'i sprin kha cig las ni/ gzungs tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan brjod pa dag byung ngo / /'od zer rgya mtsho'i sprin kha cig las ni/ rnam par thar pa tha dad pa rgya
mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa rjod pa dag byung ngo / /'od zer rgya mtsho'i sprin kha cig las ni so so yang dag par rig pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs
med pa'i khyad par bstan pa rjod pa dag byung ngo / /'od zer rgya mtsho'i sprin kha cig las ni mngon par shes pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan brjod pa byung ngo / 'od
zer rgya mtsho'i sprin kha cig las ni smon lam tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa rjod pa dag byung ngo / /'od zer rgya mtsho'i sprin kha cig las na brtson 'grus rnams
tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa rjod pa dag byung ngo / /'od zer rgya mtsho'i sprin kha cig las ni dbugs 'byin pa thob pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad kyi
par bstan brjod pa dag byung ngo / /'od zer rgya mtsho'i sprin kha cig las ni byang chub sems dpa' la 'jug pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho glangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa rjod pa dag byung ngo / /
'od zer rgya mtsho'i sprin kha sdig las ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jug pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa rjod pa dag byung ngo / /'od zer rgya mtsho'i sprin kha cig
las ni sems can gyi bsam pa dang / spyod pa la 'jug pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan brjod pa dag byung ngo / /'od zer rgya mtsho'i sprin kha cig las ni 'jig rten

gyi khams la 'jug pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa rjod pa dag byung ngo / /'od zer rgya mtsho'i sprin kha cig las ni bskal pa la 'jug pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i
khyad par bstan pa rjod pa dag byung ngo / /yang de'i tshe shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang yin pa de dag ni 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/ g.yon rab tu gul/
kun tu rab tu g.yo/ ldeg /rab tu ldeg /kun tu rab tu ldeg /chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem chem/ 'khrug /rab tu 'khrug /kun tu rab tu 'khrug /'ur 'ur/ rab tu
'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur ro/ /de nas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams re re nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang+gA'i klung lnga bcu'i

bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed lhags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re re'i 'khor yang byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi

khams rgya mtsho gang+gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed lhags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po'i sprin gzungs rgya

mtsho grangs med pa brjod pa/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po bcu'i tshad tsam gyi char gyis chags pa med cing sgrib pa med la ma 'dres pa'i nam mkha' khyab par byas nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste
lhags nas byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang lha'i nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po'i sprin ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho grangs med pa brjod pa/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po
bcu'i tshad tsam gyis chags pa med cing sgrib pa med la ma 'dres pa'i nam mkha' khyab par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gtor cing mngon par gtor la mngon par rab tu gtor to//
gtor cing mngon par gtor la mngon par rab tu gtor nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te lan grangs med par bskor ba byas/ rang rang gi smon lam las
byung ba'i seng+ge'i khri la 'khod do/ /shar phyogs ji lta ba de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / shar lho'i mtshams dang / lho nub kyi mtshams dang / nub byang gi mtshams dang /
byang shar gyi mtshams dang / steng dang 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang yin pa de dag kyang 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/ g.yo/ rab tu g.yo/ kun
tu rab tu g.yo/ /ldeg /rab tu ldeg /kun tu rab tu ldeg /chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem chem/ 'khrug /rab tu 'khrug /kun tu rab tu 'khrug /'ur 'ur/ rab tu
'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur ro/ /'jig rten gyi khams de dag re re nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab
rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed lhags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' re re'i 'khor yang byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang+gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye

ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed lhags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po'i sprin rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med
pa brjod pa/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po bcu'i tshad tsam gyi char gyis chags pa med cing sgrib pa med la ma 'dres pa'i nam mkha' khyab par byas nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong
ste lhags nas byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po'i sprin so so yang dag par rig pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa brjod pa/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po bcu'i tshad tsam
gyis de bzhin gshegs pa la gtor cing mngon par gtor la mngon par rab tu gtor to/ /gtor cing mngon par gtor la mngon par rab tu gtor nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
mgo bos phyag btsal te lan grangs med par bskor ba byas nas rang rang gi smon lam las byung ba'i seng+ge'i khri la 'khod do/ /yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug tor dang / mdzod spu dang /

mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang po re re dang / ba spu'i khung bu re re nas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang+gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs
med pa snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul lta shin tu nyung gi /de bas ches mang ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho dag byung ste/ de dag
thams cad kyang lus dzam+bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi mdog can/ gzi brjid nyi ma 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa bas lhag pa/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la rnam par rtse ba/
sangs rgyas kyi sku mdog yongs su grub pa mtha' yas pa sgrub pa'i gzungs thob pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas mi bzhugs pa dag tu sangs rgyas 'byung ba ston pa/ 'jig rten gyi
khams kun nas nyon mongs pa can yongs su sbyong ba pad+ma'i stan la 'khod pa sha stag go /pad+ma re re'ang rin po che thams cad kyis spras pa/ sdong bu rnam pa sna tshogs pa/ nor bu rin po che'i
ze ba can/ gser gyi 'dab ma bkod pa/ shin tu rgyas pa'i gzugs can/ dzam+bu chu bo'i gser gyi snying po dang ldan pa/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs kyi sa phyogs thams cad kyi sprin snang
bar byed pa/ kun nas 'od zer bkod pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yul mtha' yas pa'i gsung brjod pa'i 'od zer nor bu dang / mu tig dang / rin po che'i phreng ba rab tu 'gyed pas mdzes par byas
shing gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng ba sha stag go /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis 'od zer rgya mtsho 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa btang nas

pad+ma de dag las babs te lha'i gdugs kyi sprin dang / rgyal mtshan gyi sprin dang / ba dan gyi sprin dang / me tog gi sprin dang / spos kyi sprin dang / rin po che'i sprin dang / rol mo'i sgra'i sprin

dang / rgyan gyi sprin dang / seng+ge'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i sprin dang / lha'i sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / glu'i dbyangs kyi sgra'i sprin chags pa med cing sgrib pa med la ma 'dres pa stong gsum gyi
stong chen po bcu'i tshad tsam gyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag la gtor cing mngon par gtor la mngon par rab tu gtor to/ /gtor cing mngon par gtor la mngon par rab tu gtor nas lan
grangs med par bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas lan grangs med par bskor ba byas te rang rang gi pad+ma'i stan la 'khod do/ /byang chub sems dpa'
gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i nang du chud pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag nas byung ba de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis bla na
med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas pa sha stag go /de nas 'khor de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i nang du chud pa'i 'jig rten gyi
khams rnams sangs rgyas kyi mthus bdag cag gis mthong na ci ma rung snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa thugs kyis
mkhyen nas gtsug tor nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i nang du chud pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams ston pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer 'khor 'od zer grangs med pa dag byung ste/
des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par byas nas bdud kyi gnas thams cad mog mog por byas so/ /sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul
pa thams cad kyang bstan te/ sems can gyi khams mtha' yas pa yongs su smin par byas nas yang phyir log ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas la lan grangs med par bskor ba byas nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi lus la phog par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi lus la 'od zer des pog ma thag
tu'ang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzod spu dang / gtsug tor dang / mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang po re re dang / spu'i khung bu re re la 'jig

rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang+gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul lta shin
tu nyung gi /de bas ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag na mes 'jig pa dang / chus 'jig pa dang / rlung gis 'jig pa dag mthong ste/ dper na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya

mtsho gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho srid pa'i rtse mor thug par ra bas bskor te/ rdo dang / gseg
ma dang / gyo mo med cing / lag mthil ltar mnyam par gyur nas rdul phra rab kyi rdul gyis gang ba la 'jig rten gyi khams gang du me'i 'jigs pa dang / chu'i 'jigs pa dang / rlung gi 'jigs

par mthong bar de dag ni/ ra ba de'i nang gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul gcig lta bur blta bar bya'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gnas pa ni/ rdul phra rab kyi
rdul lhag ma ji snyed yod pa tsam du blta bar bya'o/ /de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che skar 'od las grub pa yin no/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu

rin po che glog gi sgron ma las grub pa yin no/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che nyi zla'i sgron ma las grub pa yin no/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po
che snang ba thams cad 'dus pa las grub pa yin no/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po las grub pa yin no/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu

rin po che ze ba can las grub pa yin no/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che seng+ge'i ze ba las grub pa yin no/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che seng+ge rdol
rje'i rtse mo las grub pa yin no/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che brgya byin thogs pa las grub pa yin no/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la
ni| nor bu rin po che lha thams cad kyi 'od las grub pa yin no/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che rdo rje'i 'od las grub pa yin no/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
la la ni| nor bu rin po che pad+ma rA ga las grub pa yin no/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che chu 'dang las grub pa yin no/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/
yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che las grub pa yin no/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che bai DUR+ya las grub pa yin no/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor
bu rin po che an+da rnyil las grub pa yin no/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che mthon ka chen po las grub pa yin no/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu
rin po che rdo'i snying po las grub pa yin no/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che dpal gyi snying po las grub pa yin no/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor
bu rin po che mdzod bkod las grub pa yin no/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni| mu tig dkar po las grub pa yin no/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ mu tig gser
mdog las grub pa yin no/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ mu tig nam mkha' mdog las grub pa yin no/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che bsod nams kyi

tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa brjod pa las grub pa yin no/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che ye shes kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan

pa brjod pa las grub pa yin no/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa brjod pa las grub pa yin no/ /'jig rten gyi
khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po ches rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa brjod pa las grub pa yin no/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che gzungs rgya mtsho
grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa brjod pa las grub pa yin no/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa brjod pa las
grub pa yin no/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che so so yang dag par rig pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa brjod pa las grub pa yin no/ /'jig rten gyi khams
rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che mngon par shes pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa brjod pa las grub pa yin no/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che smon
lam rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa brjod pa las grub pa yin no/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che brtson 'grus rtsom pa rgya mtsho
grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa brjod pa las grub pa yin no/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che dbugs 'byin thob pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa
brjod pa las grub pa yin no/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che byang chub sems dpa' la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa brjod pa las grub pa
yin no| |'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa brjod pa las grub pa yin no/ /'jig rten
gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che sems can gyi bsam pa dang / spyod pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa brjod pa las grub pa yin no/ /'jig rten
gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che 'jig rten gyi khams la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa brjod pa las grub pa yin no/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la
ni| nor bu rin po che bskal pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa brjod pa las grub pa yin no/ /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul
phra mo re re la zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed du sna tshogs su gnas pa dag snang ngo / /zhing re re na'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag snang
bar gyur te/ zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi kha dog tu gnas pa dag snang ngo / /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
gang dag gis byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa slob tu bcug pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang snang bar gyur to/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das de dag sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcug pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang yin pa de dag kyang snang ngo / /de bzhin du sangs rgyas gcig
nas gcig tu brgyud pa phyi ma'i mthar thug pa'i bar du bstan kyang sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa de dag gi mtha' bstan par mi nus so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das re re la'ang
'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho dpag tu med grangs med pa dag snang ngo / /byang chub sems dpa'i de dag gi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho rnam pa sna tshogs bstan pa gang yin pa de dag
kyang thos so/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'ang snang ngo / /de dag gi byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho dag kyang snang ngo / /byang chub
sems dpa' de dag gi byang chub kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho rnam pa sna tshogs bstan pa gang yin pa de dag kyang thos so/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis mngon par
rdzogs par byang chub pa dag kyang snang ngo / /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das re re'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dpag tu med pa grangs med pa dag kyang snang ngo / /de dag gi
byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs gang yin pa de dag kyang snang zhing thos so/ /de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sangs rgyas gcig nas
gcig tu brgyud pa'ang bskal pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi bar du bstan kyang mthar phyin par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sku dang ye shes
chags pa med pa brnyes pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mos
par byed cing 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / 'don du 'jug pa dang / mar me dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos
dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan la sogs pas mchod pa de dag gi bsod nams ji snyed cig 'phel bar 'gyur zhig gu snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho

gang+gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul lta shin tu nyung gi /de bas ches mang
ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba pha rol tu phyin pa lnga las byung ba bskal pa dpag tu med grangs med pa'i bar du bskyed pa'ang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pa'i
byang chub sems dpa' tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gyur pa la zan chang gcig tsam yongs su btang bas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba pha rol tu phyin pa lnga las byung ba de
zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ dper na/ zla ba yar gyi ngo tshes bco lnga'i nam phyed kyi dus na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis 'di ltar mtho ba dang / mtshungs pa med pa dang / che
bas skar ma'i 'khor thams cad zil gyis gnon te/ lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger 'dug go /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar
dge ba'i rtsa ba mtho ba dang / mtshungs pa med pa dang / che bas byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba pha rol tu phyin pa lnga las byung ba rnams
zil gyis gnon te/ lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger 'dug go /'jam dpal/ byang chub sems dpa' gang la las stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad dbyug pas bsnun tam/ mtshon gyis btab skye bdog pa thams cad 'phrog pa pas/ 'jam dpal/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan zhig gis byang
chub sems dpa' la gnod sems dang / tha ba dang / khro ba'i sems bskyed de brnyas pa'i sems kyang bskyed na/ 'di ni/ de bas ches sdig pa mang po 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa' la gnod sems dang / tha ba dang / khro ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / brnyas pa'i sems bskyed pas ni/ chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i las byas
par 'gyur te/ chos ma yin pa yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ chos ma yin pa yongs su 'dzin pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi gdung gcod par byed pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas rnams ma byung na rgyal chen
bzhi'i lha'i ris rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang

byed pa rnams dang / bdud kyi ris rnams kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /zla ba dang nyi ma thams cad kyang
'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /'khor los bsgyur ba dang / stobs kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba rnams kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /mi'i 'jig rten yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag
thams cad ni/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang phrad pa las 'byung la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ byang chub sems dpa' las 'byung ba'i phyir ro/ /de bas na/ sangs rgyas
thams cad la mchod par 'dod pas ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mchod par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mchod pa byas na/ sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod par 'gyur
ro| |byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bkur sti byas na/ sangs rgyas thams cad la bkur sti byas par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ byang chub sems dpa' gang la las sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das

'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed la lha'i zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa dang / lha'i na bza' phul te/ sbyin pa de lta bu bskal pa rgya mtsho gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
kyi rdul snyed kyi bar du phul la/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan zhig gis ni/ byang chub sems dpa' la dmigs pa gang yang rung ba zhig gis byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ bdug pa las dmigs
pa'am| mar me las dmigs pa'am/ me tog las dmigs pa'am/ spos las dmigs pa'am/ gzhan gang yang rung ba zhig las dmigs te byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ 'di ni/ de
bas ches grangs med par bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur na/ gzhan skyed du 'jug pa gang yin pa dag lta ci smos te/ 'di ni/ de bas bsod nams ches grangs med
pa skyed par 'gyur ro/ /snga ma de ni/ bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa 'di'i brgya'i char yang mi phod/ stong gi char yang mi phod/ 'bum gyi char yang mi phod/ bye ba'i char yang mi phod/ bye
ba brgya'i char yang mi phod/ bye ba stong gi char yang mi phod/ bye ba 'bum gyi char yang mi phod de/ dpe dang rgyur yang mi bzod do/ /'jam dpal/ byang chub sems dpa' gang la las sems
can thams cad byang chub kyi sems la bkod la/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan zhig ni/ stong pa nyid la mos par gyur na/ 'di ni/ de bas ches grangs med par bsod nams 'phel bar
'gyur na/ gzhan mos pa skyed du 'jug pa gang yin pa dag lta ci smos te/ 'di ni/ de bas bsod nams ches grangs med par skyed par 'gyur ro/ /bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa snga
ma de ni| bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa 'di'i brgya'i char yang mi phod/ stong gi char yang mi phod/ 'bum gyi char yang mi phod/ bye ba'i char yang mi phod/ bye ba brgya'i char yang mi
phod| bye ba stong gi char yang mi phod/ bye ba 'bum gyi char yang mi phod de/ dpe dang rgyur yang mi bzod do/ /'jam dpal/ byang chub sems dpa' gang la las byang chub sems dpa'i zan
bcad dam/ khros te tha na byang chub sems dpa' glang po cher skyes pa de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sangs rgyas la bskyed pa gcig bcad la/ 'jam dpal/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan zhig gis ni/ chos

kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / don gyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / brgyad pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas 'jig rten
gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi zan bcad de/ khros nas lhung bzed dang / chos gos med par byas la/ sems can thams cad long bar byas na/ mi dge ba'i las 'di ni/ snga ma'i mi dge
ba de'i brgya'i char yang mi phod pa nas dpe'i bar du'ang mi bzod do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma de

dag dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang /
mi dang / mi ma yin pa rnams dang / phyogs tha dad pa nas lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho grangs med/ tshad med pa rnams yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par

bstod do/ /mdo'i rgyal po chen po sprin chen po'i le'u re re la chos snang ba'i sgo stong phrag gang+gA'i klung grangs med pa'i bye ma snyed yang dag par 'du bya ba snang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dpal gyi glog gis
gsal bar byas pa'i le'u chen po'i tshogs mtha' yas pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed las/ dga' ldan gnas pa la sogs pa 'jig rten grangs med pa dang mthun par
'jug pa'i stobs la sbyor ba'i mthu las byung bas dbang byed cing / phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho 'dus pa'i dga' ston chen po la rtse ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa
bdun pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+d+he ye shes sdes zhus te gtan la bab pa/ rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya ma hA me g+ha bA yu

maN+Da la pa ri brta sarba nA ga hr-i da ya nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sprin chen po rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u klu thams cad kyi snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs
rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgya mtsho chen po na nor bu rin po che'i rtse mo can gyi khang pa brtsegs

pa na klu stong du tshang ba'i klu'i tshogs chen po klu thams cad kyang rdzu 'phrul che zhing klu'i 'khor chen po dang ldan pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / klu'i rgyal po nye dga' dang / klu'i

rgyal po yang dag sgul dang / klu'i rgyal po glog phreng can dang / klu'i rgyal po gzi can dang / klu'i rgyal po gzi can chen po dang / klu'i rgyal po btang bzung dang / klu'i rgyal po dung dang / klu'i

rgyal po e la'i 'dab ma dang / klu'i rgyal po mtshams bzang dang / klu'i rgyal po stabs kyis rgyu dang / klu'i rgyal po glog 'byung dang / klu'i rgyal po snod ldan gtsug phud can dang / klu'i rgyal po

sprin chen rnam par 'phrul dang / klu'i rgyal po sprin chen rgyas byed dang / klu'i rgyal po 'brug sgrog dang / klu'i rgyal po char 'byung dang / klu'i rgyal po skar mda' stong dang / klu'i rgyal po dus
min sgrog dang / klu'i rgyal po 'brug skad dang / klu'i rgyal po glog rab tu gtong dang / klu'i rgyal po sa 'dzin dang / klu'i rgyal po sog ma med dang / klu'i rgyal po legs mthong dang / klu'i rgyal
po rnam par snang dang / klu'i rgyal po 'brug chen sgrog dang / klu'i rgyal po 'od chen lam lam dang / klu'i rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid dang / klu'i rgyal po mtha' yas dang / klu'i rgyal po mdongs

bu dang / klu'i rgyal po dpal 'dzin dang / klu'i rgyal po rnga sgra dang / klu'i rgyal po rnga sgra rnam par sgrog pa'i skad dang / klu'i rgyal po la ba dang / klu'i rgyal po 'dren byed dang / klu'i rgyal po dpal

mgrin dang / klu'i rgyal po dpal bzang dang / klu'i rgyal po sha sho sgra chen dang / klu'i rgyal po ding ding sgra dang / klu'i rgyal po rab 'joms dang / klu'i rgyal po char 'byung dang / klu'i rgyal po rlung chen

rnam par 'phrul dang / klu'i rgyal po rlung rab tu gtong dang / klu'i rgyal po 'jog po dang / klu'i rgyal po dpal ldan dang / klu'i rgyal po smad dkris bzang dang / klu'i rgyal po bkra shis dang / klu'i
rgyal po sprin rgyas dang / klu'i rgyal po sprin gyis dga' byed dang / klu'i rgyal po sprin gyis 'gebs pa'i rigs dang / klu'i rgyal po legs par 'gebs dang / klu'i rgyal po

rnam par rtse dang / klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bu dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po 'od bzang dang / klu'i rgyal po mthong dga' dang / klu'i rgyal po don yod dga' dang / klu'i rgyal
po sprin gyi dkyil 'khor gyis legs par 'gebs dang / klu'i rgyal po gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang / klu'i rgyal po sprin las chu 'byin dang / klu'i rgyal po bde mthong dang / klu'i rgyal po rlung
'byung dang / klu'i rgyal po rlung 'khrug par byed dang / klu'i rgyal po gtsug na nor bu dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po de dag dang / gzhan yang klu'i rgyal po chen po stong dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs
te| de dag thams cad kyang klu'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / klu'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen pos nam mkha' la di ri rir sgrog cing / rdzi char chen po rab tu 'bebs te bcom ldan 'das la sri zhu bya

ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir lhags so/ /kye klu chen po dang klu dag tshur sheg /mu lu mu lu/ tsa ta tsa ta/ pa Da pa Da/ ma Ta ma Ta/ hA hA/ glog 'bar ba rab tu phyung zhing rdzi char chen po'i rgyun thong la
char phob cig /kye kye klu chen po dag /sangs rgyas kyi bden pa dang / chos kyi bden pa dang / dge 'dun gyi bden pa dran par gyis shig /kye klu chen po dag /tshur tshur/ tshur sheg tshur sheg /

dzam+bu'i gling du char rab tu phob cig /gu Tu gu Tu/ mu Tu mu Tu/ hi hi hi hi/ tsu Ta tsu Ta/ ma hA nA gA hr-i da ya/ sarba nA gA na/ A ga da D+ha/ san tso da ya/ shi grA na da ra swAhA/ sprin chen po rnam par

'phrul pa'i rgyan bkod pa dag gser snam gyi mtha' rin po che thams cad tshon gyi lnga ldi mdzes pa/ mu tig gi rgyan phreng rab tu 'phyang ba/ rgya mtsho chen po'i sprin dag dang / lha'i rin po ches mdzes
par byas pa'i gzhal med khang me tog rab tu 'phyang ba/ rgya mtsho chen po'i sprin dag gis nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor kun tu khebs par byin gyis rlobs la rin po che'i sprin rab tu 'phyang zhing lha'i

ras bcos bu mang po dang / mu tig gi rgyan phreng rgya mtsho chen po'i sprin dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa zab mo sna tshogs kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi sgra sgrog pa rgya mtsho'i sprin dag dang / de bzhin
gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi rgyan bkod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam pa sna tshogs yang dag par ston pa'i rin po che bkod pa chen po rgya mtsho'i sprin dag gis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par

byin gyis brlabs te sprin chen po rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgra sgrog pa rgya mtsho'i sprin dag dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi lha'i bla bre dril bu'i sgra snyan pa sgrog pa rgya mtsho'i sprin dag dang / bya'i tshogs

thams cad skad 'byin cing me tog gi char chen po rab tu 'bebs pa rgya mtsho chen po'i sprin dag dang / rgya mtsho sprin chen pos sgra cher sgrog cing lha'i rin po che rab tu 'phyang la/ mu tig gi lnga ldi rnam
pa sna tshogs rab tu 'phyang ba rgya mtsho'i sprin dag dang / gser skud kyis brgyan pa'i snang ba chen po can gyi rtse mos nam mkha' kun tu khebs par byed pa rgya mtsho
chen po'i sprin dag dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi phreng ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis nam mkha' kun tu khebs par byed pa la mkhas pa rgya mtsho'i sprin dag dang / snang ba dang ldan pa'i
rgya mtsho chen po'i sgras kun tu khebs pa'i rgya mtsho chen po'i sprin dag gis nam mkha' mngon par khebs par gyis shig /klu dang klu'i rgyal po thams cad tshur shog /sa'i steng 'dir
'brug sgra sgrogs shig /char phob cig /char rab tu phob cig /char kun tu rab tu phob cig /di ri rir sgrogs shig /glog chen po snang ba rab tu phyung zhig /'du zhing kun tu 'du la tog

yar dir dir zhing 'dug ste/ klu'i skad chen po yid du 'ong ba'i sgra chen po 'byin cing dbyangs chen po rab tu sgrog pa dag dzam+bu'i gling du char rab tu phob cig /g+ha Da g+ha Da/ g+hi Di g+hi Di/ hu Du hu Du/

gu Du gu Du/ ga Da ga Da/ gi Di gi Di/ ma Ta ma Ta/ tsa Ta ca Ta/ pa Ta pa Ta/ kye kye klu dang klu chen po dag /tshur tshur/ tshur sheg tshur sheg /d+hu d+hu d+hu d+hu/ hA hA hA hA/ hI hI/ hU hU/ hUM hUM/ 'brug sgra
chen po sgrog cing rlung chen po rab tu gtong ba dag sangs rgyas kyi bden pas dzam+bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swAhA/ kye kye klu dang klu'i rgyal po dag /klu thams cad la yang dag par

bskul gyi/ dzam+bu'i gling du char phob cig /g+hu Du g+hu Du/ pha Da pha Ta/ hA hA/ he he/ klu chen po dag /'dus shig /sa'i steng du char rab tu phob cig /gu ru g+hu ru/ ki ri ki ri/ tsi ri tsi ri/ mi tsi mi
tsi| di ri di ri/ ki li ki li/ zhing thams cad yongs su gang bar gyis shig /'bru dang / shing ljon pa dang / rtswa dang / shing gel pa dang / sman thams cad rab tu skye bar gyis shig /byams
pa'i sems kyis tshur sheg /sangs rgyas kyi bden pa dang / chos kyi bden pa dang / dge 'dun gyi bden pa dang / lag na rdo rje'i bden pa dang / klu thams cad kyi bden pas klu chen po dag tshur shog/
tshur sheg /klu'i rgyal po mdongs bu la yang dag par bskul lo/ /sangs rgyas kyi bden pas dzam+bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swAhA/ klu'i rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid la yang dag par bskul lo//
chos kyi bden pas dzam+bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swAhA/ klu'i rgyal po mtha' yas la yang dag par bskul lo/ /dge 'dun gyi bden pas dzam+bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swAhA/
klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bu la yang dag par bskul lo/ /lag na rdo rje'i bden pas dzam+bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swAhA/ klu'i rgyal po 'jog po la yang dag par bskul lo/ /tshangs
pa'i bden pas dzam+bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swAhA/ klu'i rgyal po dpal mgrin la yang dag par bskul lo/ /dbang po'i bden pas dzam+bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swAhA/ klu'i
rgyal po sa srung gi bu la yang dag par bskul lo/ /khyab 'jug gi bden pas dzam+bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swAhA/ klu'i rgyal po phreng ba can la yang dag par
bskul lo/ /drag po'i bden pas dzam+bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swAhA/ klu'i rgyal po gzi can la yang dag par bskul lo/ /drang srong gi bden bas dzam+bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob
cig swAhA/ klu'i rgyal po skrag 'bros byed la yang dag par bskul lo/ /lha'i bden pas dzam+bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swAhA/ klu'i rgyal po gzi can chen po la yang dag par bskul
lo| |klu'i thams cad kyi bden pas dzam+bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swAhA/ klu'i rgyal po rab tu 'joms la yang dag par bskul lo/ /gnod sbyin gyi bden pas dzam+bu'i gling 'dir char
rab tu phob cig swAhA/ klu'i rgyal po thams cad la yang dag par bskul lo/ /srin po'i bden pas dzam+bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swAhA/ klu gong ma gong ma thams cad kyi bden
pas char phob cig /char phob cig /ma 'phyi bar tshur sheg /kye kye klu chen po dag /klu thams cad kyi snying po la yang dag par bskul lo/ /kun nas drang ngo / /sa ra sa ra/ hA hA/ d+hu ma d+hu ma/ hA

hA hA hA| hi hi hi hi/ e h+ye hi/ tha tha tha/ tsa tsa tsa ra ta/ zhing thams cad kun tu gang bar gyis shig /'bru thams cad kyi char phob cig /rlung chen po rab tu thong zhig /drUm drUm/ g+hUng g+hUng /

bU ma bU ma/ Ta Ta Ta Ta/ ni bA ra Ni/ stam+b+ha ni/ mo ha ni/ dzAM gU li/ buk+ka si/ bra hA ne/ ma ting+ga/ ja ye bi dza ye/ hA hA swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen snying po dpal gyi gzi brjid dang /
de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen rab 'joms dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin 'byung dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen snying po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen kun tu 'gebs
dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug chen sgrog dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen rgyas mdzad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug chen rnam par sgrog pa'i sgra'i rgyal po dang / de bzhin
gshegs pa sprin chen 'jig mdzad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen srung dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen rnga sgra dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug chen sgra dang / de bzhin
gshegs pa sprin chen dpal gyi gzi brjid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen dbyangs snyan dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen skar ma'i rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin
chen 'tshub ma'i rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen shin tu brtan pa'i rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen brtan pa'i dga' bar mdzad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
sprin chen 'ur 'ur sgra dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen 'jigs pa'i 'jigs mdzad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen thog tog rab 'bebs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen
rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen bkra shis kyi tshad dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / byang chub sems
dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen po sprin chen snying po thams cad la yang dag par bskul lo/ /klu thams cad kyi bden pas klu thams cad kyi
snying po la yang dag par bskul lo/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi bka' lung gis myur du shog cig /kye kye klu dang klu chen po dag /tshur sheg tshur sheg /hu lu hu lu/ su ru su ru/ d+ha ba d+ha ba/
g+ha ra g+ha ra/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ ma 'phyi bar sangs rgyas kyi bden pas tshur sheg /chos kyi bden pas tshur shog /dge 'dun gyi bden pas tshur sheg /klu thams cad dang / klu chen po gong ma
gong ma dag gi bden pas 'dzam gling du char phob cig /a la la zhes gar byed cing / a la la zhes glu len pa dang / a la la zhes klu'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen po byed cing 'dul char gyi

rgyun chen po 'bebs par byed/ klu chen po rnams kyi chos kyi sgra yid du 'ong ba ston pa gang / gu lu gu lu/ nA ge nA ge /ste tsa na ta nA ga ni/ ha ha Di shi /nA ga na gi ni nA ge /sarba nA ga bish+Ta ma

b+ha ne| ma ra Na Ta ra na TA re/ TA ra Ta ra/ TA re ka bi la/ ke Shi/ bi ka te diSh+Ta/ b+ha ya nA ye/ a kad+D+ha/ a kad+D+ha/ ma bi lam+ba tha/ bi Tu da re/ go ra re bi ni/ ka li a ka le/ gardzi te/ sarba me

g+ha bi kurba Ni/ saM tsod na/ sarba k+She tra a pu ra Ni/ tsakri/ tsakra brte/ he ru he ru/ bi gi ba bi/ sma ra sma ra/ kA li kA li/ ma hA kA li/ hr-i da ya/ pra ba tha/ a da te/ ma da te/ sarba nA ga /A kaR+Sha ni/ bU

ra ya bU ra ya/ hU ma hU ma/ rad+na tra ya bi ku te/ badzri Ni/ badzri Ni/ badzra badzra bA ni/ kA la sho dA re/ nA ga rU bi ni/ su rU be/ b+ho gi b+hi gi /ma hA b+ho gi /b+ho ga rU ba ta ya/ ba la/ baR+Sha ni/ sarba nA ga sany+tso da ni

swAhA| na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma sha tsan+Da badzra pA Na ye/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ su rU pe/ ka li rU pa ni swAhA/ chos smra bas thog ma kho nar srung ba'i cho ga byas la chos gos kyi grar lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te
mdud pa bor nas rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u klu thams cad kyi snying po zhes bya ba 'di/ zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du rgyun ma chad par bklag par bya'o/ /shar phyogs su ni/ ba lang gi lcibs

klu'i rgyal po mgo gsum pa zhes bya ba 'khor dang bcas te bri bar bya'o/ /lho phyogs su ni/ klu'i rgyal po rab tu rgyas byed ces bya ba mgo lnga ba 'khor dang bcas te bri bar bya'o/ /nub phyogs su ni/
klu'i rgyal po snang ldan gtsug phud can zhes bya ba mgo bdun pa 'khor dang bcas te bri bar bya'o/ /byang phyogs su ni/ klu'i rgyal po sprin skul zhes bya ba mgo dgu pa 'khor dang bcas te bri bar
bya'o| |bla bre dang / gos sngon po dang / rgyal mtshan sngon po dang / lha bshos thams cad kyang sngon por bya'o/ /klu rnams la dbab pa ni/ mngar gsum gyis bya'o/ /mngar gsum gyi dgang
blugs bdun yang klu'i snying pos sbyin sreg bya'o/ /sprin gyi rgyal po rnams kyang bris te char gyi rgyun 'bebs la phan tshun thug cing mthar glog 'gyu bar bya'o/ /
'dir dbab pa ni/ khur ba bkra shis ldan dang / ben tse dang / sha dang / nya sha dang / sbrang rtsi las byas pa'i zas mchog rgyas par bya'o/ /de nas chos smra ba gtsang zhing gos gtsang ma
bgos nas rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u klu thams cad kyi snying po bklag par bya'o/ /de nas klu rnams dang po'i nyin mo nas brtsams te di ri rir sgra sgrog par byed cing sgra yid du 'ong ba dag
'byin par 'gyur te/ le'u 'di la the tshom dang brnyas par mi bya'o/ /gal te rgya mtsho dus tshod las yol na/ 'di'ang char las yol bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal gyi snying po brtsegs pa rnam par bsgrags pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnga sgra sgrog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin bdal
la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra sgrog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin kun tu ston la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas sprin 'dzag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin rnam par rgyas mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin gyi yan lag mdzes la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin lta bu'i na bza' mnabs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas sprin gyis 'bru skrun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin gyi phreng ba can la phyag 'tshal
lo| |bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin 'thor la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin gyi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
sprin 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra la phyag 'tshal
lo| |bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin gyis byin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra rnam par sgrog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin gyi chu la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin sdud la phyag 'tshal
lo| |bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug nges par bsgrags la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas thams cad la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can thams cad la bde legs su gyur cig /'byung po thams cad la byams par gyur cig /dud 'gror gyur pa thams cad 'jigs pa med par gyur cig /
ngan 'gro thams cad zhi bar gyur cig /sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi cho ga /sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gzigs
pa'i cho ga 'di grub par gyur cig /tad+ya thA/ sbu ta spu ta/ spu Ta s+phu Ta s+phu Ta swAhA/ char mi 'bab pa'i tshe dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig gis
mgo bkrus te gos gtsang ma bgos la byams pa'i sems dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di dag yi ger bris nas gdan gtsang ma la bzhag ste pog phor bdun gyis
nam mkha' la gyen du bdug cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rnams lan lnga bcu'i bar du brjod la mchod pa chen po byas te zhag bdun gyi bar du rgyun ma chad par byas na char
'bab par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa sprin chen po rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u klu thams cad kyi snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi
na mi tra dang / su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+d+he ye shes sdes zhus te gtan la phab pa/ rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya ma hA me g+ha/ bod skad du/'phags pa sprin chen po/
sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos ba dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo'i
gnas na nor bu rin po che dpal gyi snying po'i sprin gyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa na dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' dge 'dun chen po
dang / klu'i rgyal po'i tshogs chen po 'di lta ste/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' dang / rgya mtsho dang / ma dros pa dang / gzi can dang / chu lha dang /
'jog po dang / yul 'khor srung dang / nor rgyas kyi bu dang / klu'i rgyal po btang bzung dang / sa srung gi bu dang / mdongs bu dang / dpal gyi gzi brjid dang / dpal bzang dang /
glog gi phreng ba dang / gtsug na nor bu rin po che dang / gtsug na nor bu thogs dang / snang ldan gtsug phud can dang / gtsug phud 'ja' can dang / klu'i rgyal po dbang po'i
rgyal mtshan dang / dbang po'i chos sdong dang / dzam+bu'i rgyal mtshan dang / bkra shis ldan dang / dkyil 'khor chen po can dang / lag gis 'gro chen po dang / skar mdog dang
zla ba'i gzi brjid dang / dpal gyi blo gros dang / zla mthong dang / klu'i rgyal po legs mthong dang / shin tu brtan dang / mgul na nor bu dang / sprin byung dang / char rgyun dang /
rab 'joms dang / rnam par 'joms dang / mthu bsgyings dang / gdengs ka chen po dang / dbyangs zab dang / klu'i rgyal po char sgrog dang / rnam par sgra 'byin dang / ut+pa la
dang / rtsal chen dang / gshol mda' 'dzin dang / sna tshogs sde dang / zhags pa chen po dang / klu'i rgyal po e la'i 'dab ma dang / kun tu snang dang / rna rtsub dang / dung dang / da
ra da ra dang / klu'i rgyal po u ba da ra da ra dang / bde byed dang / lag 'gro dang / lag 'gro chen po dang / dri ma chen po dang / 'phur lding dang / sog ma med dang / 'phyang ba dang / srin bu gan

dang / nag po dang / klu'i rgyal po dbang po sde dang / 'dam bu dang / nye ba'i 'dam bu dang / dud thogs dang / 'gro lding dang / rab mdzes dang / glang chen rna dang / rnon po dang / ser skya dang / glong
'bar dang / glog 'od chen po dang / stobs lha dang / chu stobs dang / klu'i rgyal po dam pa 'gebs dang / bdud rtsi can dang / mu stegs can dang / bai DUR+ya'i 'od can dang / gser mdog
sgra dang / gser 'od dang / zla ba'i rgyal mtshan 'od dang / nyi 'od dang / 'char pa dang / bal glang mgo dang / klu'i rgyal po dkar po dang / nag po dang / gshin rje dang / dge tshul dang /
sbal pa dang / dad pa'i gzi brjid dang / mu khyud 'dzin dang / sa 'dzin dang / mgo stong can dang / gtsug na nor bu dang / klu'i rgyal po don yod mthong dang / sprin chen dang / sde bzang dang / sa

skyong dang / mis byin dang / rnam par dul dang / rga ba 'byung dang / chu srin kum+b+hi ra dang / chu srin kum+b+hi ra'i gdong dang / dug 'dzin dang / klu'i rgyal po myur gdug dang / pad+ma ka dang / 'jug

ma dang / rab 'phyang dang / 'jigs byed dang / gzi brjid mdzes dang / mgo lnga pa dang / bal li ra dang / shing rta sa rgyal dang / klu'i rgyal po bla ma dang / klu'i rgyal po mjug ring dang / mgo bo che
dang / bim bi ka dang / bi ta ra dang / mgyogs 'gro dang / klu'i rgyal po mgo gsum dang / klu sde dang / gzi chen dang / 'dam bu byin dang / klu'i rgyal po skrag
byed dang / 'od 'bar dang / mgo bdun pa dang / stong chen dang / mthong dga' dang / rab tu cher gtum dang / dri med gzi brjid dang / mig bzang dang / drag po chen po dang / 'od
'phro phung po dang / klu'i rgyal po gtum po dang / khro bo drag shul can dang / rin chen chu sbyin dang / chu sbyin sprin chen dang / dbang po'i 'od dang / rkang pas 'thung dang / sprin zla dang /
rgya mtsho'i sprin dang / me tog dri chen dang / ku mu da'i 'byung gnas dang / klu'i rgyal po rin chen mig dang / tog chen po'i rgyal mtshan dang / sprin chen snying po dang / kha ba can dang /
dpal gyi snying po dang / sprin mthu can dang / mtshan mo 'dzin dang / chu sbyin dang / chu sbyin chen po dang / klu'i rgyal po gzi brjid med 'dra dang / sprin gyi dbang phyug rgyal po dang / khro
med dang / sa'i bum pa dang / klu dpa' dang / chu 'dzin dang / sprin gdugs dang / ang gi ra'i gdong dang / gzi brjid can dang / sprin las mngon byung dang / klu'i rgyal po gom
stabs mtha' yas dang / chu byed mdzes dang / lus chen dang / spyad lto dang / zhi ba dang / dpa' ba dang / gser ngan can dang / mchog tu brtson dang / dug dag dang / dbyangs snyan

dang / klu'i rgyal po bdud rtsi'i snying po dang / rab tu char 'bebs chen po dang / rnam par g.yo dang / 'khrugs sgra dang / rnga sgra dang / bdud rtsi rgyun dang / dga' bar byed pa dang / 'brug sgrog

dang / dpa' sde dang / sred med kyi bu dang / rgya mtsho'i glong dang / klu'i rgyal po yon po dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po de dag la sogs pa klu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dag
'dus te 'khod pa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po de dag 'khor dang bcas te stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te pus mo g.yas pa'i lhang sa
la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bla ma la gus pa dang / phu dud chen po byed pas me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang /
byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / dar gyi lda ldi dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / glu dbyangs dang /
rin po che'i me tog dang / rin po che'i lda ldi dang / mu tig gi phreng ba dang / klu'i me tog dang / mu tig gi dra ba mchog tu mdzes pa rnam pa sna tshogs dpag tu med grangs med pa dag
bcom ldan 'das la phul nas bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas smon lam rnams btab pa/ lus rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyis sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams
rab 'byams rgya mtsho thams cad dang / sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams dang / gzugs su snang ba thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams las
rdul phra rab kyi rdul re ra la'ang lus kyi sprin rgya mtsho bgrang ba'i rgya mtsho thams cad las yang dag par 'das te grangs med/ dpag tu med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa
med| gzhal du med/ brjod du med pa las yang dag par 'das pa dag dang / lus re re la'ang lag pa rgya mtsho'i sprin phyogs kun gyi rgyun du mngon par phyogs pa dpag tu med/ grangs
med pa dag byin gyis brlabs nas rdul phra rab kyi rdul gyi char re re las kyang mchod pa thams cad kyi sprin rgya mtsho phyogs kun gyi gzhi rgyas par 'gengs pa ma 'dres pa rnams kyis
sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la mchod pa bya'o snyam pa 'di lta ste/ kun tu spyod pa'i lus rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa dpag tu med/ grangs med/ bsam
gyis mi khyab pa/ gzhal du med/ tshad med/ brjod du med pa dag gis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs nas byang chub sems dpa'i lus rgya mtsho sprin
rnams kyis ji lta ba de bzhin du rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog dang / 'od zer stug po dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba thams cad lta bu'i lus kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnam par

rin po che thams cad kyi phreng ba dang / me tog gi rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi snang ba chen po'i snying po khang ba brtsegs pa rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams dang / phye ma dang / shing
ljon pa thams cad kyi mdzod rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / spos dang / bdug pa thams cad kyi gzugs kun tu ston pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sgra thams cad sgrog pa'i rol mo'i sgra rgya mtsho
sprin rnams dang / spos thams cad kyi shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs nas de la sogs pa mchod pa thams cad kyi sprin
rgya mtsho dpag tu med/ grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du med/ tshad med/ brjod du med pa/ ma 'dres pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams
cad la bsti stang du bya'o/ /bla mar bya'o/ /ri mor bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /yul thams cad du bkod pa rnam par snang bar byas pa'i snying po can gyi nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis
nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs te sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/ /bla mar bya'o/ /ri mor bya'o/ /mchod par
bya'o| |thams cad kun tu snang ba'i rin po che'i char 'bab pa bkod pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba 'bar
dang ldan pa sangs rgyas la nges par gyur pa'i dbyangs kyi nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / kun tu sgras 'gengs pa sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi dbyangs can nor
bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / kun nas sgo rin po che 'od zer gyis sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa snang bar byed pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor ma 'dres pa
rnams su bkod pa thams cad snang ba kun tu ston pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / 'od 'phro ba sgron ma sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i nor bu'i
rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams su de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzhal med khang snang ba kun tu ston pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po rgya
mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi rdul la dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi sku snang ba rnam par snang bar byed pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i
dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs te sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho sprin thams cad la/ bsti stang du bya'o/ /bla mar bya'o/ /ri mor bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /
rin po che dang / spos dang / me tog sna tshogs thams cad kyi khang pa brtsegs pa ma 'dres pa rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams dang / nor bu rin po che rgyal po kha dog mtha' yas pa thams cad
kyi rab tu brgyan pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che'i sgron ma dang / spos kyi 'od 'phro ba can gyi khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / mu tig thams
cad kyis rnam par spras pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / me tog thams cad kyi ze ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che'i phreng ba mtha' yas pas legs par brgyan
pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs nas phyogs bcu kun tu 'od zer snang ba'i snying po can bkod pa thams cad
yang dag par 'du ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi rdul gyis rab tu brgyan pa bkod pa du ma kun tu ston pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin
rnams dang / bkod pa thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sgo kun tu me tog gi rta babs dril bu'i dra ba dbyangs
pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu/ khebs par byin gyis brlabs te/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/ /bla mar bya'o/ /
ri mor bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /gser dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi tshong tshong dang / phreng ba dang / rin po che'i mgul gdub kyi snying po can gyi seng+ge'i khri rgya

mtsho sprin rnams dang / me tog ltar snang ba sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi seng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / an+da rnyil dang / dzam+bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi pad+ma sna tshogs kyi snying po can

gyi seng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu rin po che'i sgron ma'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu rin po che snang gsal rgyal mtshan gyi pad+ma sna

tshogs kyi snying po can gyi seng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po ches brgyan pa pad+ma sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi seng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / an+da rnyil mdzes par
'bar ba'i 'od gser ldan gyi pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / 'od zer 'bar ba zad mi shes pa'i gzi brjid dang ldan pa'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng+ge'i khri
rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che 'bar ba thams cad byung ba'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che 'bar ba mchog dam pa thams cad byung ba'i

pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi gsung sgra'i 'od zer dang ldan pa'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams kyis
nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs te sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/ /bla mar bya'o/ /ri mor bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /sres

dang / nor bu sna tshogs thams cad kyi shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / kun nas sgo lo ma las thal mo sbyar ba'i sprin 'byung ba'i spos kyi shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / shing
ljon pa thams cad kyi gzugs mtha' yas pa bkod pa kun tu ston pa'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / me tog thams cad kyi sprin rab tu 'phyang pa'i sprin shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin
rnams dang / bkod pa thams cad 'byung ba'i mdzod mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che 'od 'phro ba thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par snang bar

byed pa'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lus phyed tsan+dan thams cad kyi phye mar kun tu ston pa'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / byang chub kyi snying po
thams cad kyi bkod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'od can gyi shing ljon pa'i rin po che gos thams cad kyi mdzod nyi ma ltar snang bar byas pa dang ldan pa'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /

sgra dbyangs thams cad sgrog pa yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs kun tu gtong ba'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che kha dog mtha' yas pa'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho
sprin rnams dang / kun tu mngon par phyogs pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po snang bar byed pa'i snying po can gyi seng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rgyan bkod pa thams cad

kyis rab tu brgyan pa'i snying po can gyi seng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che sna tshogs 'od 'phro ba'i sgron ma'i phreng ba'i snying po can gyi seng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / kun

nas sgra rin po che'i shing ljon pa 'byung ba'i snying po can gyi seng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / spos dang / me tog dang / pad+ma thams cad kyi phreng ba rin po che'i snying po can gyi seng+ge'i khri rgya
mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gdan bkod pa kun tu ston pa'i nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po'i snying po can gyi seng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / bkod pa thams
cad kyi phreng ba rab tu dbyangs pa'i rta babs stegs bus rab tu brgyan pa rin po che'i sprin gyi snying po can gyi seng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu rin po che'i yal ga dang /
phye ma'i mdzod yod pa'i sdong po thams cad kyi snying po can gyi seng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / spos sna tshogs dang rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba kun nas rgyan nyi ma snang
bar byed pa'i snying po can gyi seng+ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs te sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams
cad la bsti stang du bya'o/ /bla mar bya'o/ /ri mor bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal po thams cad kyi gzhal med khang rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / an+da rnyil gyi ze ba

can gyi me tog bkod pa thams cad kyi bla bre rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / spos dang / nor bu thams cad kyi bla bre rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba'i sgron ma'i gzugs kyi bla bre

rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul rnam par ston par snang ba'i dbyangs can gyi nor bu'i rgyal po'i bla bre rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu sna tshogs kyi gos bkod pa thams

cad snang ba kun tu ston pa'i bla bre rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / me tog thams cad kyi chu bo 'bar bar snang ba'i rin po che'i bla bre rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / dril bu sna tshogs kyi sgras kun tu

rgyas par 'gengs pa'i dra ba'i bla bre rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / pad+ma 'bar ba kha dog mtha' yas pa sna tshogs su snang ba'i nor bu'i snying po can gyi pad+ma'i dra ba'i bla bre rgya mtsho sprin rnams
dang / gser gyi ze ba can gyi 'od zer snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi bla bre rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / bkod pa bsam gyis mi khyab par snang ba'i 'od mtha' yas pa bkod pa thams cad kyi rgyan
gyi bla bre rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs te sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang chen mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o//
bla mar bya'o/ /ri mor bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /nor bu rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi gdugs rgya mtsho rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par
byin gyis brlabs la rin po che bcu'i 'od zer snang ba bkod pa'i me tog gi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / mu tig kha dog mtha' yas pa'i mdzod kyi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin
rnams dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi snying rje'i sgo'i sgra'i nor bu rgyal po'i gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'od 'phro
ba'i phreng ba'i gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che'i rdul kun tu snang bas rab tu brgyan pa'i dril bu'i dra ba dbyangs pa'i gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu thams
cad kyi sdong pe'i yal ga'i rgyan gyi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nyi ma rnam par snang bar byed pa'i 'od 'phro ba'i nor bu'i rgyal po dang / spos dang / bdug pa thams cad kyi
gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / tsan+dan gyi phye ma'i mdzod kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul rgya chen po snang bar byed pa
kun tu bkod pas rgyas par 'gengs pa'i gdugs rgya mtsho sprin pa 'dres pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/ /
bla mar bya'o/ /ri mor bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /rin po che thams cad snang ba'i dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che 'od 'phro ba thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya
mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams dang / me tog gi sprin snang bar byed pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i 'od kyi
dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang bar gtogs pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / kun nas sgo sangs rgyas kyi yul
rtogs pa rin po che'i yal ga'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / bai DUR+ya dang / rin po che'i rigs dang / nor bu rin po che'i ri rgyal po thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi 'od kyi dkyil
'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sems can gyi gzugs mtha' yas pa dag sems kyi skad cig la kun tu ston pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas thams
cad kyi smon lam las byung ba yid du 'ong ba'i sgra rab tu 'byin pa dang ldan pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du sems can 'dul ba'i
dbyangs can nor bu'i rgyal po'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/ /bla mar bya'o/ /ri mor bya'o//
mchod par bya'o/ /nor bu thams cad kyi mdzod kyi 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang /

reg bya'i 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos sgrog pa rgyas par 'gengs pa'i 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin
rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bkod pa thams cad snang bar byed pa'i 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang
rin po che thams cad kyi rdul gyi 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / bskal pa gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad du sangs rgyas 'byung bas sems can yongs su smin par byed pa srog pa
can gyi 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che mi zad pa thams cad bstan pa dang / me tog thams cad kyi ze ba'i 'ong zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / khri stan bkod pa thams cad
kun tu ston pa'i 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/ /bla mar bya'o/ /ri mor bya'o/ /mchod
par bya'o/ /rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba kha dog mtha' yas pa rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams dang / kun tu 'od kyi nor bu'i rgyal po 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas
thams cad kyi zhing rgya chen po bkod pa snang bar byed pa'i 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / spos thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / bkod pa thams cad kyi 'od

'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sprul pa'i 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing gi ze ba 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /
gos thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas pa'i spyod pa dbyangs can nor bu'i rgyal po'i 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / mu tig
